1b1(mdo 'grel): da ni b+hU la sogs pa byings At+ma ne'i tshig
1b2(mdo 'grel): can rnams la/ rnam dbye At+ma ne pa de rnams sbyar ba'i cho ga 
1b3(mdo 'grel): 'chad par bya ste/ e d+ha 'phel ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la 
1b4(mdo 'grel): laT sogs At+ma ne pa de rnams sbyar/ cho ga rnams b+hU thob pa la 
1b5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ laTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum 
2a1(mdo 'grel): byal/ e d+ha te/ e d+ha la laT sha pa rjes 'brel phyis nas la/ ta ta las a byung / Ta 'gro ba sogs 
2a2(mdo 'grel): kyis mtha' e/ tra drangs pa'o// e d+he te/ e d+ha la sha pa laT/ la A tAM tra las Am byung / Ta 'grog sogs kyis mtha' e dras 
2a3(mdo 'grel): Ata kying 'gro ba la 'os A i y+ra wa ya dag gi la la la dbyi 'os ya byis/ i mtshams sbyar/ e d+han+te/ e d+ha la/ shab laTal 
2a4(mdo 'grel): dz+ha dz+ha las a pUng / d+ha'i an+ta/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha' e/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os/ gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs 
2a5(mdo 'grel): laru skyes bu dbus pa gsum la/ yanapa 
2b1(mdo 'grel): lang byi sa la gyis i la tshams thar/ e d+had+he/ e d+ha la/ sha pa laT la dwaiT 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha' me/ skyes bu phyi ma gsu pa la/ e d+he/ e d+ha la/ shab laTal in 'gro sags kyis/ i e mata bya yod tan la 
2b2(mdo 'grel): bos gnyis dag gis gcig pa rol gyi gzugs/ e d+hA ba he/ a d+hal/ sha ba laT la wa hi dang cing / Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis tha' e/ ata kyi mnyal ring po 'os/ a ring por song / e d+ham te/ e d+ha la ling / sha pa/ ling gi 
2b3(mdo 'grel): sI yus/ sI yuT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hal sha pa li laT lingal sI waT/ Ta gnas do u brjod dod wal dag gi bal la 'os ya phyis/ ling gi bza' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi 'os sa phyis mtshams 
2b4(mdo 'grel): s+yang / e d+he ta/ ed+hab sha pa li la AtA tra baSh+Ta sAM lu rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gis tha'am yin pa sogs kyis sa byis mtshams sbyar/ e d+he yA tAM/ e d+he rar/ e d+he la sha pa ling badz+ha sI l+raT rjes 'brel phyis ling gi mtha' ma yin pa 
2b5(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis phyis mtshams sbyar/ dz+ha'i ran 'os d+ha rar/ wa ya dag gis bal la dbyi 'os sa phyis/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+he thAHe d+hal sha pa ling la thAs sI yuT rjes 'brel phyis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis la 
2b6(mdo 'grel): yang dag gi bal la dbyi 'os sa byis/ e d+he yA thAM/ e d+ha la/ sha pa ling la AH si yul ling gi mtha' sa yin pa sogs kyis sa phyis mtshams sbyar/ e d+ha d+h+waM/ e d+ha la ling sha pa la d+hA sI yuT ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa byis/ ba ya 
2b7(mdo 'grel): zhes pas sa phyis/ skyes pa phyi ma gsum ya/ e d+he ya/ e d+hal shang ling la i ts+li mra rjes 'brel gyis iTa'i lata 'os i atas phyis mchigs sbyar/ e d+he ba hi/ e d+ha la sha pa/ ling / la ba hi dang ma tong du bsgyur/ sI sa?H 
2b8(mdo 'grel): rjes 'brel gyis wa ya dag gis zhes pa sa ya byis/ ling gi mtha' ma yin pa sogs kyis sa byi ramatshams sbyar/ e d+he ya/ e d+ha la loT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+ha tAM/ e d+ha la sha pa lo/ la ta Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' 
3a1(mdo 'grel): mamata thabs sosasam/ aHSh+Ta/ maN+Dal shapa la la sacwa man kyang 'grub langs lnga ma ma ma mnyams srung bdag gizhes pas ma byis/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' me med gyi ma ngas slang yang rnam sog/ 
3a2(mdo 'grel): e d+han+taM/ e t+ta la laTal d+ha d+ha'i yan 'os d+he laT 'gro ba la sogs kyi mtha' me eta kyi snga ma'o sa e Am ata kyis yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gas gcig pa rol gyi gzugs/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e d+hasa?/ ma dul gas 
3a3(mdo 'grel): la thAs thAs kyi se 'os smras seMs sa dgal ba sa ma dag gos/ e wa/ e r+d+ha nAM/ me nya lag pa lordul 'grum sa kyid te la nas/ lams pa ya dag gnyis pas ma gyis/ mamatshams gyur/ 'gra ba sags kyis mtha'as 
3a4(mdo 'grel): kyi snga ma 'os me ma skam/ e d+had+haM/ me t+pa la sha pa lo Ta la dzAT 'gro ba sags kyis mtha' ses bdagal bas ga dgos/ me srang yang lam/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+hi/ ye pagal yo la i grobs gas kyis ma ma 
3a5(mdo 'grel): edzes me i ru bskur gyi ma'i aT ste zhes pas/ AT a ka 'drab la ring po a Tha'i 'phel ba byas/ ai d+hU ba he/ e t+pa la sha pa lo Ta la wa hi dang ma ting du bskur na 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' me en gyi me 'os ma yi phyi ma'i aT ste zhes pas/ ya tha gnas pa/ 
3a6(mdo 'grel): aka' dra ba la ring po/ e d+ha ma he/ e d+ha la lang sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai d+ha ta/ e d+ha la yang / la ta ma tsa dang po rnams kyi AT 'os byings la aT/ Ta gnas don/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba/ ai d+he tAM/ e d+ham sha ba la dbyis 
3a7(mdo 'grel): la.AT dang 'phel ba la A tAmar 'gro ba la ata kyis 'os A i ya wa ya dag gi zhes pas ya phyis mtshams sbyar/ ai d+han+ta/ e d+ha la sha pa la byings la AT dang 'phel ba/ ladz+ha d+ha'i An+ta'os dz+ha An+ta/ ata kyi yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gis gcig pha rol gyi gzugs/ skyes 
3a8(mdo 'grel): budabus ma gsum la/ e d+ha thA/ e d+ha la sha pa/ lang la thAs byings la/ aT dang 'phel ba/ a d+hi thAM/ e N+Dal gang la dbyings pa/ aT dang 'phel ba la An+ta/ da 'gro ba la AT kyis 'os A mi ya ba ya dag gis bal la 'os A phyis mtshams kyas 
3b1(mdo 'grel): ai d+hA d+hA/ e tal shang langs byings la Ata dang 'phel ba la dwai du bsgyur/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+h+we/ e d+ha la sha ba la byings la Ata 'phel ba la iT ru bsgyur mtshams sbyar/ e d+hA ba hi/ e d+ha la sha ba langs sa la aT dang 'phel ba la wa hi dang ma ting drab 
3b2(mdo 'grel): ata kyi yata la ring po 'os ring po/ ai d+hA ma hi/ e d+ha la lung / lung la ts+li 'os/ tI byin/ ts+li'i si tsa 'os si tsar bsgyur/ a tsa dang po'i AT 'os byings la AT/ AT las kyang 'os 'phel ba dang / byings phyid pa'i bal la 
3b3(mdo 'grel): iT 'os/ iT skyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ ai d+hiSh+Ta/ lata nga? bsgya kun nas bskur ba sogs kyis pa Sha cul kha Tu'os taT/ ai d+hiShA thAM/ la A twe dra bskur kun nas bsrung ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ ai d+hi Sha ta/ ladza 
3b4(mdo 'grel): bcur dz+halas ma byung nas/ at+man par rnams sa a ng+ga min pa las so/ d+ha mata dra bsgyur/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ oM d+hiSh+Tha/ lathAs kun nas bsgyung ba sags kyis sa la yul 'thu bos thaH/ i d+hiSh+Tha thAM/ la a Sh+Ta kun nas bsrungad ba sogs 
3b5(mdo 'grel): kyikyi sa/ i d+hir+thaM/ ma dz+dza N+Das 'ang ngas sa kyis miTa'i gdam da 'os rgyang gnas sam yang naH/ oM d+hi d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ oM d+hi She/ ma i ru bsgyur/ ai d+hiSh+Tha haM/ la btan bskar/ oM ma d+hiSh+ma ti/ lam 
3b6(mdo 'grel): ting du bsrur/ e d+ha la/ liT/ rits+tsha ma yin pa'i i tsa dang po las kyang lci ba ldan pa las so zhes pas/ byings mthar am sbyar am las so sa liT yang 'jig pas/ e d+h+waM zhes pas grub/ de laM kranya sogs 
3b7(mdo 'grel): sbyar dgos/ Am pra t+ya ye bad+me nyo nu pra yo ga s+thA/ rkyen A ma bzhin kr-inya rjesu sbyar ba'i'o/ Am gyi rjes su sbyor ba'i kr-i b+hU a sa gsum las/ e d+ha lta bu byings At+ma ne pa da can la a ma sbyar ba yin kyang / b+hu dang / 
3b8(mdo 'grel): as gnyis par smai'i tshig can yin pas liT par smai'i pa de'i rkyen rnams sbyor ba kho na yin la/ gau nya gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas/ A ma spyor yul gyi byings de at+man pa dacan yin na snga ma dang 'dra bar kri ang+ge ne'i rkye chen 
4a1(mdo 'grel): sbyong bar byed la/ byings de pa ra smai pa dacan yin na kr-inya yang par smai pa di'i rkyen can sbyar bar bya ste/ e d+hi la b+hU dang as sbyar ba la/ e d+hi ba ShA ba/ ai d+ha mA sa/ kr-inya sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ 
4a2(mdo 'grel): dwai tsa kre/ kr-il/ liT/ 'thil gyi sa a b+has med pa'i 'os byings gnyis brjod de'i ata 'os yata du bsgyung / ba t+ya dag gi chu 'os ka cal ta ru bskur/ liTa'i dz+ha dag gi ye sha er ba'is/ ta e sha sha gyis a ka gi a tsa la yaH/ eng+ge tsakA te/ la 
4a3(mdo 'grel): A tAMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ e d+h+waM tsa kr-i re/ kr-i la liTi byings gnyis brjod de'i a 'o sa ra a kra ha dag gi Ta 'os katsa la d+ha ru bsgyur/ liTi'i ta dz+nya dag gi e sha yi se 'os dz+ha i sa ru bsgyur/ tsa dbyangs don i ka gi atsa la yan byas pa'o// skyes bu 
4a4(mdo 'grel): dbus ma'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig la/ e d+h+waM tsakr-i She/ la thAs sra bsgyur zlas kyi se 'os thAs se kun nas bsgyung ba sogs kyis sa Sha/ e d+h+waM tsa krA the/ la A thAMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ i ka gi a tsa la yaH/ skyes bu 
4a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ e d+h+waMHkr-i d+h+we/ kr-il lan byings gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'o pa ri a ku ha dag gi tsu 'os ka tsa la d+h+waMT 'gro ba sogs kyis mtha' e/ mdo 'dis d+haH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ e d+h+waM tsakre/ la iT ru bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi 
4a6(mdo 'grel): mtha' me/ e drA tsakr-i ba te/ la bti nga ma nyid du bsgyur/ Ta 'gro ba sogs kyi mtha' e/ e d+h+waM tsakr-i ma he/ e d+ha la luT wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ e d+hI tA/ e d+hi tA rau/ e d+hi tAr/ 
4a7(mdo 'grel): skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ e b+hi tA se/ meN+Dal/ praT t+pa la blasas bsgyur/ rdzab gyi seM ma la// rnam ma ste ga shes bye sa rnas kyims kyis dang pa ma/ i d+hetA sAH/ las babyung / rnga 'gro ba sogs kyi 
4b1(mdo 'grel): mtha' me me/ la bye d+he d+ha ba gro ba sogs kyis mthal me d+ha la bang ngos rnas kyis sa kyis/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a d+hi trA he/ me d+ha pa sa ba rnas la meT ru bsgyur/ thab gro ba sogs kyi e e me ta la ta 'osas tapa la dang po'i yiT/ e d+d+he 
4b2(mdo 'grel): tAs+ya t+ye/ mabaci nyid stsu 'gro ba sogs kyis mthar me/ e d+hi tAswa te/ et+pa la smon pa'i ling sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsam la/ e d+hid+hiSh+Tha/ e d+hiShA ya s+t+waM/ e d+hiSh+Thi ran/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ oM 
4b3(mdo 'grel): d+hob+h+yob+h+r-i b+h+yaHe d+hi ShI yastAM/ e d+hiSh+TaM d+h+waM/ e d+hiSh+NIn+te/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ la yid da bsgyar/ oM Te mata'os/ oMta aH/ e d+hiSh+Ti la/ oM d+hiSh+Ti ba te/ oM d+he ShI ma te/ e d+hi la l+r-iT sbyar ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ 
4b4(mdo 'grel): e hrIH/ skyes bud byas ma gsas la/ e hrIHsaM/ / sa d+hiHd+he/ skyes bu gyi ma gsum la/ med+h+yeH/ me tiShA ba to/ e d+hi ma \u0f7f/ e d+ha la/ l+r-ing / macang pa 
4b5(mdo 'grel): ATa'os byings la AT/ aT las kyang ngos/ 'phel ba/ sra sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsam la/ i d+hiHta/ ai d+hih+ye tAM/ i d+hiSh+Than+ta/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ oM d+hiH thA/ i d+hiH 
4b6(mdo 'grel): bAM/ i d+hid+ha/ skyes bu phyim gsum la/ e d+hiH/ a d+hiHba te/ oM d+hiSh+Tam he sogs te/ chog pal che rnguthob pa'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'drag// e Takalta ba ma 'o nas pa'i byings la/ maT sogs 
4b7(mdo 'grel): nonipa da rnams sbyor ba'i cho ga thams cad bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra'o// s+yAd sbyin pa la'o zhes pa la lan sogs at+man par rnams sbyang bas cho ga yang liTa'i skabs ma gtogs me b+ha'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ phaTal/ dad te/ di te/ 
4b8(mdo 'grel): sogs sa/ lang sa/ da te/ dade yaSh+Ta/ dad nasags sa// la/ da d+da/ da \u0f7f/ da migs sa// yang sa/ yad ta/ ya tAM/ yad na/ sogs so// grangs/ ma / 
5a1(mdo 'grel): da di Shata sogs so// liT la/ byings gnyis brjod pa dang wal dang po la iT sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dad de/ dad dA twe/ dad di do// skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dad 
5a2(mdo 'grel): diShe/ da da dA the/ dad di d+he/ dad daT+Te/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ dad de/ dad di ba he/ dad di ma hi sogs te/ 'dir sha sha/ dad/ ba dang po sogs kyi mdos/ A b+h+yA sa dbye ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs mi byed do// luT 
5a3(mdo 'grel): la byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la iT 'os iT sbyar bas/ dadi tA/ da di tA ro/ da di tAr/ dadi tA se/ da di tA sA the/ dadi tA d+h+we/ da di tA he/ da di tA swa he/ da di tA sA he/ smon pa'i ling la'ang iT sbyar ba'i/ da diShISh+Ta/ da diShI ya stAM/ 
5a4(mdo 'grel): dadIShI ran sogs so/ l+r-iT la wa dang po'i iT dang s+ya tAs zhes pas/ s+ya sbyin pas/ da di Sh+ya te/ da di Sh+ye te/ da de Sh+yan+te sogs so/ de bzhin du/ l+r-iT la a da di byata/ a da di bye tAM/ a da diSh+yen+ta sogs so// Sh+yeSh+Ta 'gro ba la'o zhes pa la/ 
5a5(mdo 'grel): laT sogs aSh+man pad rnams sbyar/ cho ga bshad ma thag pa dang 'dra/ 'dir phub kyi byings sogs kyi byings kyis dang po'i Sha ser mi 'gyur te/ laT la/ ShaSh+ma te/ ShaSh+kan+te sogs so/ ling la/ Shen+teta/ SheSh+ka ya stAM/ 
5a6(mdo 'grel): b+he ran sogs so// loT la/ ShaSh+ka tAM/ ShaSh+Te tAM/ lar+han+taM sogs so// lang la/ a ShaSh+kata/ a Shar+the tAM/ a ShaSh+kan+ta sogs so// lung la/ be la dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ a laSh+TiSh+Ta/ a shrI ShA thAM/ a la/ Sha ta sogs 
5a7(mdo 'grel): so// liTa'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Sha ShaSh+Te/ ra Sh+mA te/ Sha lal+lI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ Sha lang+gi re/ ShaShaSh+kaShe/ Sha laSh+Te d+h+we/ Sha ShaSh+mi d+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ShaShaSh+Te/ ShA Shan+ti ba he/ Sha nim he/ luT+rag/ 
5a8(mdo 'grel): mi sbyang ba'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ la ti/ 'ani tI / 'd-ik+Shar/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ ShawI Sh+Ta se/ 'azhig+sa pa/ lanIk+ShahUM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ shrIn+d+ra te/ lad-iSh+Ta s+ya te/ lahrI sa te/ smon pa'i ling 
5b1(mdo 'grel): gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Shani Sh+T+rIn+da/ Shad-i NAM ya s+t+wa~M/ 'di ngan/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza niSh+T+r-iH/ ShaSh+T+rI tI yaSh+Ta/ 'ahrI ShI / 'ahrId+hInAM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ ShanISh+Ti ya/ 2na NI ba / 
5b2(mdo 'grel): maH/ l+r-iT la/ rtsa nang thal dang po'i mi sbyin pas/ la te/ lan gyi/ lan nyi sogs so// de bzhin du/ waT la/ a ldan byaH/ a Shan ts+yait+taM/ a lad-i \u0f7fna/ sogs sa// ring 'grab la ste gnas pa 
5b3(mdo 'grel): 'ang ngo zhes pal/ laT sogs mthun pa da rnams sbyang ba'i chog tham da barba ste/ laT la/ a te/ arbe te/ anga? nye sogs so// ling sa/ a ta/ adza AH/ ardza na sogs so// loT la/ arba NAM/ a 
5b4(mdo 'grel): tAM/ ar+tha n+ti sogs so// lang la/ Adz+ra ta/ Ar+the tAM/ Ardza na sogs so// lungal/ bal dang po'i iT dang r+t+ti sitsa ru bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ ArdziSh+Ta/ ardi ShAtAM/ A Shata sogs so// liT la/ byings 
5b5(mdo 'grel): gnyis brjod/ r-i'i ata 'os/ ri a dang dang po'i ata kyi ring po de la nuT steng ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ Ar+tha dAti/ A rdzi ti/ Anr-i dzi ngi/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ A nr-i Shi/ Anr-ing gi/ 
5b6(mdo 'grel): Anr-i dza d+hI/ A nr-i dzir+the/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ Ar+thaM dzaM/ A nr-i dzaM ba te/ Anr-i dzi ma te/ luT la/ wal dang po'i iT dang tAs sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ ardzi tA/ ardzi tA ro/ ardzi tAr/ ardzi tA se sogs so// 
5b7(mdo 'grel): smon pa'i ling la/ ardiShISh+Ta/ ardzi ShA ya stAM/ a rdzi ShI ran sogs so/ l+r-iT la/ wal dang po'i iT dang s+ya tas dag waM luT dag la 'os s+ya sbyar bas/ ardzi Sh+ya te/ a rdzi Sh+ye tAM/ ardzi b+h+yan+d+he sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ 
5b8(mdo 'grel): Ardzi Sh+yata/ Ardzi bye tAM/ e rdzi D+yan+ta sogs so/ 6/ tid ni ba la ste bzod pa la yang ngo zhes pa la/ gu pa ti dza ki ta rnams las san 'os/ sa nas na yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po lhag po 'os dza gong ma phyis/ tsu ka? 
6a1(mdo 'grel): Shas/ rdug/ la car sa/ ka ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sags kyis saSha/ kaSha 'dus pa k+Sha/ 1/ zhes bsgrubs pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ titi/ te/ Ni/ ti te/ ni sogs so// ling la/ 
6a2(mdo 'grel): taitetate/ ti tik+She yA tAM/ ti tik+Sha ran sogs so// loT la/ ti tik+ShatA/ tai tik+Shet+taM/ ti ti k+Shan+ta sogs so// lang la/ a ti ti k+Sha ta/ a ti tI N+De tAM/ a te te Shan+ta sogs so// lung la byings kyis ga pas [ऽ।]/ byed pa'i wal dang 
6a3(mdo 'grel): pa la iTa'os// iT byin/ in gyi dbyi'o// byings mtha' a dbye ba sogs byas pas/ a ti ti keSh+Tha/ a ti te She ShA tAM/ a ti tiSh+Te Shata[।ऽ]na/ sogs so// liT la/ kAs rkyen sogs 
6a4(mdo 'grel): kyis byings mthar am sbyar/ a ma las sos/ laTi 'jig/ kr-inya sogs sbyar bas/ tai te k+ShA tsakre/ ti tik+Sh+Na pa b+hA ba/ ti ti k+Sha ma sa sogs so// luT la/ wal dang po'i iT dang / aT kyi dbye ba sogs byas pas/ ti ti k+Shi tA/ titik+Shi tA/ 
6a5(mdo 'grel): ro/ tato/ tA ra/ titik+ShatAs sogs so// smon pa'i ling la'ang / titiNi ShISh+Ta/ titik+ShaSh+Ti ya s+t+wa~M/ )Sh+Ti ran sogs so// priT la'ang / byings byed pa'i bal dang pal/ eT dang / s+ya tA sa dag ces pas/ s+ya sbyar bas/ 
6a6(mdo 'grel): titaM k+ShiSh+ya te/ ti ti k+Shi Sh+ye te/ ti tik+Shi Sh+yan+te sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a ti ti Shi Sh+yata/ a ti ti Shi Sh+yetAM/ a ti ti k+Shi Sh+yan+te sogs so// / ShAny+dza yongs su 'khyud pa la'o zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang 
6a7(mdo 'grel): po'iSha ba sa 'os Sha sa/ danas ny+dzaswan+da rnams kyi sha pa la 'os na dbye ba sogs byas pas/ laT la/ sadza ti/ swadze te/ sadzan+ti sogs so// ling la/ sar+b+hota/ sadz+re yA tAM/ sadzer na sogs so// leT la/ swa 
6a8(mdo 'grel): sadz+regs can sags dang / lang la/ a sa dzaH/ a sa da~MH/ a mra dAn sogs so// lung la aT me 'jug/ rnaMs ci du bsgyur/ la las dz+wal la dbye ba dang / bu'i klu sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ lung gi skyes bu dang pa gsugs 
6b1(mdo 'grel): a sa~M k+Sh+maH/ a swak+Sha/ rgyas bung bus ma gsu la/ a saMk+ta/ a sa~M k+ShaH/ a san+ta/ skyes bubye ma gsum la/ a swany+dzi/ a prak+Shati/ a mr-i k+ShaH/ siTi la/ 'phel par lung ngas pa/ rdom ma sna pa 
6b2(mdo 'grel): le To ba kit+ta/ brtsams brtsegs pa las kyang li Ta'i kita yang na'o// sar+b+ba dang brtsegs pa las kyang pha rol gyi liT babyung ba 'brel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams ni/ yang na ka 'gro ba'i ming can du ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos pa ni/ 
6b3(mdo 'grel): iT 'gro ba ma yin pa sogs kyi kita la na dbyi ba dang yon tan sogs yang na bar bya ba'i don te/ kita kyi phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po gsum la/ sa sra dz+nyA/ sa swadz+nyA te/ saswa dzI ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ sa swa dzaM She/ sa swa dza 
6b4(mdo 'grel): the/ sa swa dza~M d+h+we/ sa swa dzi D+h+we/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ sa sra dze/ sa swa dzi ba te/ sa swa dzi ma te/ kita kyi brda chad ma byas pa'i phyogs las kyang na mi dbyi ba ma gtogs gzhan 'dra ste/ sa swany+dza/ sa swany+dza te/ sa swany+dzi de sogs so// 
6b5(mdo 'grel): luT la/ tsu'i ku 'os/ dz+wa gra/ khar la tsar 'os/ ga kar bskur bas/ saMk+tAM/ swaMk+ta ro/ sr-ik+tA ra/ sraM g+hA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ tsu'i ku dang / khang la tsang 'os/ ga ka/ kren nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi sI yu Ta'i sa 
6b6(mdo 'grel): Sha/ kaSha 'dus pa k+Sha sogs byas pas/ saMk+ShiH/ saMk+tA ya s+t+waM/ saMk+ShI na/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ tsu'i kra dang / khar la tsang / kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ sraM k+ShA te/ swak+She te/ swaM kAn+te sogs so// de bzhin du/ 
6b7(mdo 'grel): l+r-ing la/ a sraM k+ShA ta/ a swaM k+She tAM/ a swaM k+Shan+ta/ sogs so// / swa dza te'i sngon du nyer bsgyur ni skyong na/ pa ri ni bi rnams la sogs kyis Shar 'gyur te/ nI ShA dza te/ sogs so// si bA dI nI wA Ta bya pA yai& pi/ siM ba la sogs pa rnams kyi
6b8(mdo 'grel): aT ba na yod pa la'ang yang na'o// nyer bsgyur ba ri ni bi rnams las sib la sogs pa ste/ Shi bu thags 'thag pa/ Sha ta gus pa/ Sh+Tu nya stong pa/ Shany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa rnams dang suT nges par 'byung bar byed A ga ma'i sa yig rnams ni 
7a1(mdo 'grel): AT A ga ma bang na yod kyang Sha yig tu yang na 'gyur te/ n+ya Sha dza ta/ n+ya sra dza ta/ sogs te/ lang gi rjes so// sa di san+d+hoHpa ra s+ya li Ti/ sa di swan+na dag gi pha rol gyi liT la'o// sa di ste/ Sha d+bi rnam par 'gyur ba dang / 
7a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba dang / kun nas mnyes par byed pa la'o dang / Shany+dza yongs su 'khyud pa dag la liT byin pas/ byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sau'i ming can de las pha rol gyis ni/ pa ri ni mi rnams sngon ma las kyang khar 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ni 
7a3(mdo 'grel): Sha swa dze'aM/ ne Sha swany+dze/ sogs so// tra pU Sha ngo tsha ba la'o zhes pa'i byings la/ laT sogs sbyar/ u dang ShA rjes 'brel/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la/ sha pa dang byings phyed pa rnams kyi wal dang po la u 'gro ba sogs kyi iT 
7a4(mdo 'grel): yang na sbyor ba son gyis bsgrubs pas laT la/ tra pa te/ tra be te/ tra pan+te/ sogs so// ling la/ tra pe ta/ tra be ya tAM/ tra pe ran/ sogs so// loT la/ tra patraM/ tra ben+te/ tra pan+taM/ sogs so// lang la/ a tra pata/ 
7a5(mdo 'grel): tra pe tAM/ a rba pan ta/ sogs so// lung la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a tra piSh+Ta/ a tra pi Sha tAM/ atra pi Sha ta/ sogs so// iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ a trap+ta/ a tre pA tAM/ a tra pA ta/ sogs so// liT la/ tI pa 
7a6(mdo 'grel): la b+ha dza tra pa las kyang zhes pa'i mdos/ a b+h+ya sa dbyi ba dang er bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ tre pe/ tre pA te/ tre pi ri sogs so// luT la/ wal dang po'i iT yang na bar byas pas/ tra pi tA/ sogs sam/ trap+tA sogs so// smon 
7a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i ling la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ tr-i pi ShISh+Ta/ tra pi ShI ya stAM/ tra pi ShI ran/ sogs sam/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ tra prISh+Te/ traprI ya stAM/ t+yaprI na/ sogs so// l+r-iT la'ang iT yang na bar byas pas/ tra bi 
7a8(mdo 'grel): te/ tra pi t+ye te/ tra pi th+yan+te/ sogs sam/ tre s+yA te/ tram+be te/ trap+pan+te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ atra pi t+yata/ a t+ya bi ts+yaitAM/ a tra pi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs sam/ a trapyAta/ a tra p+tetAM/ aHprAH 
7b1(mdo 'grel): sogs so// ra di dza b+ho ra tsi/ ra b+hi dza b+ha dag gi a tsa la'o// ra d+ha 'tshe ba dang dza b+ha lus rnam par nyams pa dag gi rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la num A ga ma 'gyur te/ \u0f7fdza b+ha la laT sogs sbyar/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams 
7b2(mdo 'grel): la sha pa dang phyed pa bal dang po can rnams la iT sbyor ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ dzam b+ha te/ dzam+b+hi te/ dzam+ban+te/ sogs so// ling la/ dzam+b+he ta/ dzam+b+he yA tAM/ dzam+b+hi ran/ sogs so// loT la/ dzam+b+har+tha/ 
7b3(mdo 'grel): dzam+b+het+te/ dzas+thAn+taM/ lang la a dzam+b+hata/ a dzan+tetAM/ a dzam+b+han+ta/ lung la/ a dzam+b+hi ShA/ a dzam+b+hi ShA tAM/ a dzam+b+hi Shata/ sogs so// iT la/ dza dzam+b+hi/ dza dzam+b+he te/ dza dzam+b+hi re/ sogs so// luT la/ dzam+b+hi tA/ dzam+b+ha tAM / 
7b4(mdo 'grel): / sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ daM m+bI ShIH/ dzi m+b+hiSh+Ti yas+t+wa~M/ dzam+b+hi ShI na sogs so// laT la/ dzem+b+hiHte/ dzam+b+hi kyi/ ngan+ti t+ye n+te/ sogs sa// srang la/ a dzan+ti s+yata/ a dzas+t+rai ts+tshi/ a bam+b+hi b+h+yan/ sogs so/ 
7b5(mdo 'grel): dz+hab+ha brtan pa la'o zhes pa la laT la sogs rnams sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha'i sa 'os Shas/ rgyu mtshan med na rgyu mtshan can yang med do zhes pas/ ta tar log/ rnam dbye byings thams cad pa rnams la sha pa dang byed pa rnams la iT spyor 
7b6(mdo 'grel): tho sogs byas pas/ laT la/ s+hoHte/ stau b+hite/ stob+han+te/ sogs so// ling la/ s+t+waMHta/ t+te sa tAM/ sto p+te da/ sogs so// loT la/ sto d+haH/ s+ho D+h+wet+te/ stob+han/ sogs so// lang la/ a so+o d+haH/ 
7b7(mdo 'grel): b+hetAM/ asto b+han+ta/ sogs so// lung la/ astau b+haSh+Ti/ a sto b+ha ShI tAM/ a sto b+hAn+ta/ sogs so// lung la/ asto b+haSh+Ta/ asto b+hi ShA tAM/ asto b+hi Shata/ sogs so// liT la/ shar dang po sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa'i sa dbye ba 
7b8(mdo 'grel): sogs byas pas/ traSh+Tu b+he/ tuSh+NA b+hUte/ tuSh+NA b+hi re/ sogs so// luT la/ sto b+hitA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ sto b+hiShISh+Ta/ sto b+hi ShA ya stAM/ sto b+hi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ sto b+hi d+ya te/ sto b+hi d+ye te/ sto b+hi byAn+te/ 
8a1(mdo 'grel): sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a sto b+hi Sh+ya ta/ asto b+hi Sh+ye tAM/ a sto b+hiSh+yan+ta/ sogs so// pa Na tha snyad la ste bstod pa la'ang ngo zhes pa la laT sogs sbyar/ gu bA d+hA ba sogs kyi byings la/ A ya sbyor ba dang / 'grel
8a2(mdo 'grel): par At+mane pa da rnams la yang na bar bya'o zhes pa byung bas/ a ya sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la/ pa NA ya te/ pa tA ye te/ ba tA yan+te/ sogs dang / ling la/ paNA ye tA/ pa twA ye ya tAM/ pa tA yer na/ sogs so// loT la/ pa 
8a3(mdo 'grel): NA ya tAM/ pa tA ye tAM/ pa NA yan+taM/ sogs so// lang la/ a pa d+hA ya tA/ a pa NA ye tAM/ pa NA yan+ta/ so g+has so// lung la/ wa la dang po'i iT dang / aT kyi dbyi 'os byings mtha'i a phyis pas/ a ba NA yiSh+Ta/ a pa NA yi 
8a4(mdo 'grel): Sha tAM/ a pa NA yi Sha ta/ sogs so// liT la/ kas sogs kyi mdos am sbyor ba sogs byas pas/ pa NA yaM tsa kre/ pa NA yaM ba b+hU ba/ pa NA yA mA sa/ sogs so// luT la/ pa NA yi tA/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ partA/ 
8a5(mdo 'grel): yiSh+TiSh+Ta/ pa NA yi ShI ya stAM/ pa NA yi ShI ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ pa NA yi Sh+ya te/ pa NA yi Sh+ye te/ paNA yi Sh+yan+te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a pa tA yi Sh+yata/ a pa NA yi Sh+ye tAM/ a pa NA yi Sh+yan+ta/ sogs so// a ya ma sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi laT la 
8a6(mdo 'grel): pa tA te/ sogs so// ling la/ pa Ne ta sogs so// loT la/ pa Na tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a pa Na ta/ sogs so// lung la/ a pa NiSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ pe Ne/ pe NA te/ pe Ni re/ sogs so// luT la/ pa trI tA/ sogs so// smon 
8a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i ling la/ pa trI ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ pa Ni Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a pa Na Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// yang 'grel pa Na rnams dbye at+ma ne can yin kyang skabs 'gar A ya sbyar ba'i phyogs la pa ra smai pa da rnams kyang 'jug go/ zhes 
8a8(mdo 'grel): bshad pas/ pa NA ya ti sogs kyang 'byung ngo // ka me Ning / ka mi las ninga'o// ka mu mdzes pa la'o zhes pa la ngo bo'i rkyen i sbyar ba'i ka mi las pha rol tu ni 'gyur te/ ra at+man pa da 'jug pa'i don dang / dbyings la 'phel ba'i don no// 
8b1(mdo 'grel): liT la/ byed pa po la sha pa yon tan sogs byas pas/ kA ma ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ ka ma ya te/ sogs so// loT la/ kA ma yaM tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a kA ma ya ta/ sogs so// ka mu la Ni sbyar bas 
8b2(mdo 'grel): kA mi la lung / lung / nI la/ Ni/ shri sogs kyis tsI tsang du bsgyur la ta/ ka mi tsang ta/ no tsadrA ba d+hA ya hra swaHNi la tsang la u pa d+hA'i thung ngu'o// Ni mtha' can gyi u pa d+hA nI bsgyur ba'i tsang pha rol la thung ngur 'gyur te/ kA thung ngung song / tsa 
8b3(mdo 'grel): la'o zhes pas byings gnyis brjod/ ku ha dag gis nu 'os/ tsa ka/ tsa ka mi sa/ tsang ta/ zhes pa byung / sarba wa g+hu ni tsang pa ren tra glo pa/ a ka phyis pa ma yin pa la yang ba la cang pha rol la san bzhin no// byings kyi mtha' a ka so sor bsdu 
8b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i yi ge phyis pa ma yin pa Ni mtha' can yi ge yang ba yin pa de'i a b+h+yA sa'i bya ba rnams tsang pha rol la san bzhin du bya'o// sa n+ya ta/ san la ata kyi'o// san pha rol la byings gnyis brjod pa'i dang po a b+h+yA sa'i ming can gyi ata ni ita du 'gyur
8b5(mdo 'grel): te/ skabs 'dir mdo sde phyi gnyis kyis tse ka mi/ tsa ta dits+tsha la g+hoH/ yang ba'i ring po'o// yi ge yang ba'i sngon ma'i a b+h+yA sa'i Ni da tsang pha rol la ring por 'gyur te/ ci ring por song / tsi ka me/ tsang ta/ Ne ra ni Ti/ iT ma yin 
8b6(mdo 'grel): pa la Ni'o// rnam dbye byings byed pa/ iT dang po can ma yin pa pha ral la te dbyi bar bya ste/ ta'i rjes 'brel phyis/ tsang gi rjes 'brel dang ca' phyis/ lung lang sogs kyi byings la aT sbyar bas/ a nAM ke mata/ de bzhin du bsgrubs pas 
8b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a nI ka me tAM/ a tsI ka man+ta/ lung gi skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a nI ka ma thA/ a tsI ka me thAM/ a nI ka ma d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a tsI ka me/ a nI ka ma ba hi/ a tsI ka mA ma hi/ 
8b8(mdo 'grel): a ya la sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o zhes pa'i mdos maNi ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ 'grel par/ Ni med pa la'ang ni tsanga'o zhes bshad pas/ a tsa ka ma ta/ a tsA ka me tAM/ a tsa ka man+ta/ sogs so// 
9a1(mdo 'grel): liT la/ kA sogs kyi kA mi la Am sbyar/ kA mi/ A ma/ liT/ A la 'os/ lin 'jigs/ a ya man+ta lA pye tASh+Ta Shu/ Am mtha' A lu A pya it+tA ISh+Ta rnams la a ya'o// A ma mtha' dang kr-ita sogs 
9a2(mdo 'grel): kyi rkyen A lu/ A pya/ it+tha/ iSh+Ta rnams pha rol la Ni'i mtha' can ni a ya zhes par 'gyur te/ kA ma yAM tsakre/ kA ma yAM ba b+hU ba/ kA ma yA mA sa/ sogs so// Ning ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ tsa ka me/ tsa ka mA the/ tse ka mi re/ skyes 
9a3(mdo 'grel): bu dbus ma gsum la/ tsa Sha mi She/ tsa ka mA the/ tsa ka mi d+he/ tsa ka mi D+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ tsa ka me/ tsa ka mi ba hi/ tsa ka mi ma he/ luT la Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi tA/ sogs dang / Ning ma sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA 
9a4(mdo 'grel): mi tA/ sogs so// ning sbyar ba'i phyogs kyi smon pa'i ling la/ kA ma yi ShISh+Ta/ sogs dang / Ning ma sbyang ba'i phyogs la/ ka mi ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la Ning sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ kA ma yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / ning ma byin pa'i
9a5(mdo 'grel): phyogs pa/ kye/ sogs sa// de ni du byung ba'i phyogs kyi tshangs/ sa yi \u0f7f/ gas dang / de sa byung ba'i phyugs/ / rdzogs so// rgyas la 'grob pa zhes pa la la logs sbya sa/ 
9a6(mdo 'grel): laT la/ a ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ a ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ a ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ A ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ A yiSh+Ta/ sogs so// da yA yA sash+tsa/ da ya a ya/ As las kyang 
9a7(mdo 'grel): ngo// da ya sbyin pa a ya 'gro ba as nye bar sdod pa rnams las kyang liT pha rol ya Am sbyor bar bya ste/ a yal/ liT Am sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a aM tsakri/ a yAM ba b+hA ba/ A ya mU sa/ sogs so// luT la/ wal 
9a8(mdo 'grel): dang pa'i iT sbyin pas/ a ye hA/ sogs so// spen pa'i ling la/ a yi ts+tshiSh+Ta/ sogs so// m-i la/ a yi n+yate/ sogs so// l+r-ing laM/ a ya~M Sh+yata/ sogs so// u pa~M sarba sA ya ti// nyer bsgyur gyi a ya ti la ga// 
9b1(mdo 'grel): nyer bsgyur gyir yig ni a ya ti pha rol la la yig tu 'gyur te/ a ya te'i sngon du pra bzhag/ mdo 'dis ra la a 'dra ba la ring po byas/ pra d+hA/ ya te/ de bzhin du/ pa rA ya la/ pa ra pa lA ya te/ pa ri leng la ig gi a tsa la 
9b2(mdo 'grel): yaN Shes/ mtshams sbyar bas/ b.ri pa l+ya/ ya te/ 'grel par a ya te pha rol la 'ang pra ti dang ning dang dung rnams kyi ra yig la ru 'gyung ba ma yin no pa 'grob byed // zhes bshad pa sa/ praSh+ya ya te pe gyu 'tho bar byed/ ning ya te/ dung 
9b3(mdo 'grel): ya te lta bu'o// da ya 'gro ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / yongs su 'gro bar byed/ sbyin pa rnams la'o// zhes pa la/ laT la sogs pa sbyar ba'i bya ba thams cad a ya dang 'dra ste/ laT la/ da ya te/ sa ser 'gro bar byed/ sogs so// mi 'gro bar byed/ 
9b4(mdo 'grel): ling la gapa mab byed/ da ye// sogs so// baT la/ da yaSh+Ta/ sogs so// lang la/ a da ya ta/ sogs so// lung la/ a da yin+da/ sogs sa// liT la/ da ya a ya A sa las kyang nges Am sbyang bas/ da wAH pe/ dam 
9b5(mdo 'grel): / gas sa// sngon pa'i ma / #/ sgyu'i 'phel ba 'o// sa pa la ma ga 
9b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so// ling la/ s+phA ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ s+phA ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a sA ya ta/ sogs so// lung sogs wal dang po'i rnams la iT yang na bar bya ste/ 'grel par lung drangs pa/ tsA ya s+phA ya pya ya mi NA/ 
9b7(mdo 'grel): tsa ya s+phA ya/ b+ha ya rnams kyi iT yang na'o// tsA yi mchod pa/ sA yI dang o b+ha yis 'phel ba rnams kyi liT ma gtogs pa'i wal dang po'i la iT yang na bar bya ste/ lung pa/ iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a s+phA yiSh+Ta/ a s+phA yiHtAM/ 
9b8(mdo 'grel): a sA ya~M Shata/ sogs so// iTam byin pa'i phyogs la/ wa wa dag gi wal la dbyi 'os ya byis pas/ skyes bu dang po gsum la/ a swAs ta/ a sA sA tAM/ a s+phA sa \u0f7f/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a sas+thAHas+thA 
10a1(mdo 'grel): swa thAM/ a srA d+h+waM/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a smA si/ a smA swa hi/ a sA sA ti/ liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu'o zhes pas thung ngur song / shar dang po la khad 'os/ sa phyis/ a b+h+yA sa'i tsang 'ang ngos/ 
10a2(mdo 'grel): pha par bsgyur ba sogs byas brgyal 'dangos si tsa'ang byis pa'o// skyes bu dang po gsum la/ pa smA ye/ pa smA ya te/ pa s+phA yi ri/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ pa smA yi She/ pa s+phA yA the/ pa smA yi d+he/ pa sma yi d+he/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum 
10a3(mdo 'grel): la/ pa s+phA ye/ pa smA yi ba he/ pa sma yi ma he/ luT la iT sbyang ba'i phyogs la/ s+phA yi tA/ sme yi tA ro// s+phA yi ta ra/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya deg gi bal dbyi 'o sa y+ra phyis pas/ swA tA/ sA tA rau// 
10a4(mdo 'grel): swA tA ra/ sogs so// smin pa'i ling la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ s+phA yi ShI Sh+Ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ sma siSh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ s+phA yi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / iT 
10a5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i phyogs la/ wa ya dag gi zhes pas/ ya phyis pas/ sA s+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du l+r-ing la iT sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ a smA yi Sh+yata/ sogs dang / iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ ya phyis pas/ a s+phA s+ya ta/ 
10a6(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ \u0f7f/ o pyA yi 'phel ba la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ b+hA ya te/ sogs so// ling la/ prA ye ta/ sogs so// loT la/ prA ya tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a prA ya ta/ sogs so// dI pa dzan 
10a7(mdo 'grel): bud d+ha pU ri tA yi pyA yi b+h+r-i nyan+ya tar sAM/ dI pa dza na bud d+ha pU rit+tA yi prA yi rnams las yang na'o// dI pI 'bar ba/ dza nI dab du skye ba/ bung du khong du chud pa/ pU rI tshim pa/ tAM y+ra rgyud/ o pyA yI 'phel ba rnams las/ lung gi skyes bu dang po'i 
10a8(mdo 'grel): gcig tshig ta pha rol la ts+li ni yang na tsi Na zhes par 'gyur zhing yang na si tsad 'gyur te/ tsi No lug/ tsiN las 'jig go/ ts+li tsinar bsgyur ba'i tsiN las la bsgyur ba'i ta yig kyang dbyi bar bya ste/ prA ya la/ lung / lung laSh+mi dI pa sogs kyis 
10b1(mdo 'grel): babyung // 'phel da/ d+hi las 'jig pa'adon/ mad+hamado 'dis/ myis/ An+ta li/ rje ba cing bsgyung ba'i phyogs la/ tsam bgrus kyi y-i ma ba \u0f7fd+he/ oM b+h+yu 'byugs// tsun/ ma d+ya i Sh+Ta/ 
10b2(mdo 'grel): sa dang / rtags la/ ga gi a sa kyi sa/ an+ta g+ni sa n+tas// nAs/ gsas// \u0f7f/ ga nga // yangasu dag pa 
10b3(mdo 'grel): nas pa n+d+ha rAT+TAH/ sprulal y-i/ yod 'dis pa byung / gnyis na pa sogs kyis bsgrub byes/ bi n+d+ha pa m+b+haH/ bai d+ta/ skyes tha chu pa ga / bathis pazlam/ ba byad byed/ snres tha gyim gdus

11a1(mdo 'grel): tA li \u0f7fte/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ at+mA yi b+h+yaH/ a tA yi h+yet+taM/ a tA yiSh+Than+ta/ sogs so// shal g.yo ba la ste kun tu sgribs pa la yang shes pa la laT sogs sbyar bas/ laT la/ shal te/ sogs so/ 
11a2(mdo 'grel): / gas pa/ @/ 5/ gsas// yang la/ e shas te/ sogs sa// 3/ wal da ba'i yi ste bas/ yA sha dzasa?/ lags sa// la sa r+d+ha sa ci ba dang yang bsnang bsags 
11a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ she le/ she lA te/ she li re/ sogs so// luT la/ sha lI ta/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ iT sbyar bas/ sha li ShISh+Ta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ sha li Sh+ya te/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a sha li Sh+yata/ sogs so/ !/ She br-i 
11a4(mdo 'grel): bakhrud pa la'o zhes pa la/ laT sogs sbyar/ byings kyi dang po'i Sha sar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ laT la/ se pa te/ sogs so// lir la/ se be ta/ sogs so// loT la/ se ba tAM/ sogs so// lang la/ a seb 
11a5(mdo 'grel): ta/ sogs so// lung la byings phyed pa'i wa la dang po'i iT 'os/ iT byin pas/ a se biSh+Ta/ sogs so// liT la/ byings gnyis brjod/ thung ngu 'os/ e ir bsgyur ba sogs byas pas/ si She be/ si She bA te/ si She bi re/ sogs so//

16a1(mdo 'grel): luT la 'angam pa'i'o// kr-i pa la luT dang 'ang gi sgras l+r-iT dang l+r-ing rnams kyi par smai pa rnams yang na 'gyur zhing / san gyi mtha' la yang par smai pad rnams yang na 'gyur ro// trA si tsakr-I paHtA sa la'ang kyi pa'i'o// 
16a2(mdo 'grel): kr-i pa las pha rol gyi tAs dang sa yig dang po byings phyed pa pa ra smai pa da rnams la'ang iT 'gyur ba ma yin te/ luT la'ang zhes pas par smai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas pa ra smai pa da'i phyogs la/ mdo 'dis
16a3(mdo 'grel): a.iT mi 'jug/ puka mtha' sogs kyis yon tan byas pas/ kalpA kal+lA rau/ kal+lA raHkal+lA si/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ 
16a4(mdo 'grel): kalpi tA/ kal+li tA rau/ kal+li tA raH/ kal+li tA se/ sogs so// iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpA/ kalka rau/ kal+lA raH/ kalpA se/ sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis aT yang na bar byas pas/ 
16a5(mdo 'grel): iT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi ShiSh+Ta/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ at+ma ne pa da rnams la ling si tsa dag go/ zhes pas kita yin pas yon tan mi byed de/ kl-ip+sISh+Ta/ kl-ip+si yAstAM/ kl-i b+hI ran/ sogs so// 
16a6(mdo 'grel): l+r-iT la/ luT la'ang kr-i pa'i 'os/ pa rasmai pa da dang at+ma ne pa da yang na bar byas pas/ pa rasmai pa da sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tAs la'ang kr-i pa'i 'os aT mi 'jug ste/ kalpA ti/ kal+lA taHkal+lAn+ti/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da'i 
16a7(mdo 'grel): phyogs la/ Uta 'gro ba sogs kyis iT yang na bar byas pas/ aT byin pa'i phyogs la/ kalpi Sh+ya te/ sogs dang / iT med pa'i phyogs la/ kal+lA te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ luT la'ang kr-i pa'i 'os
16a8(mdo 'grel): pa rasmai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da yang na par byas pas/ pa ra smai pa da rnams sbyar ba'i phyogs la/ tAs la'ang zhes pas iT mi 'jug ste/ a kal+mata/ a kol+lA tAM/ a kalpA na/ sogs so// At+ma ne pa da'i phyogs la/

16b8(mdo 'grel): byings At+ma ne na la At+man sbyor ba dang / pa ra smai pa dacan la ra smai pa da rnams sbyor ba sogs cho ga ci rigs pa thun mong du bshad par bya ste/ swa/ TA pa tsaSha 'tshed pa la'o zhes pa la/ rjes 'brel phyis nas laT sogs sbyar bas/ laTa'i par smaib 
17a1(mdo 'grel): da rnams la/ paHti/ pa tsa taH/ pa tsan+ti/ sogs so// ut+mane pa rnams la/ patsa te/ patse te/ pa tsan+te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ byed pa po la sha pa byin pas ling gi par smai pa da rnams la/ pa6

20b5(mdo 'grel): pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams sbyar bas/ laT la/ sran ti/ sogs so// ling la/ swane ta/ sogs so// loT la/ swan tu/ sogs so// lang la/ a sran ta/ sogs so// lung la 'phel ba yang na bar 
20b6(mdo 'grel): byas pas/ a sran+dita/ a sa niSh+TAM/ a swa ni ShuHsogs sam/ a sA nIta sogs so// liT la/ pa Na sogs kyi a b+h+yA sa dbyi ba sogs yang na bar byas pas/ sa sA na/ sre na traH/ sa sA na tuHse nuHsa swa/ 
20b7(mdo 'grel): nuHsogs so// l+raT la/ wal dang po'i iT sbyar bas/ swa ni tA/ sogs dang / smon pa'i ling la/ sA n+yAta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ swa ni Sh+ya ti/ sogs so// l+r-ing la/ a swa ni Sh+yaH/ sogs so// 
20b8(mdo 'grel): gong du'i las kyang srani zas la'o// zhes pas/ sra ni'i sngon du bi dang a ba zas kyi don brjod pa na 'du 'gyur te/ biShAN+Da ti mA saM/ zas ma yin na sa Sha ru mi 'gyur bas/ bi sa nA ti b+hI tA/ sogs te/ de bzhin du/ 
21a1(mdo 'grel): a wa yang sbyang bar bya'o// / kha nu kun nas rko ba la'o zhes par smai pa can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa de rnams sbyar bas laT la/ khan ti/ sogs so// ling la/ kha ne ta/ sogs so// 
21a2(mdo 'grel): loT la/ Shan tra/ sogs so// lang la/ a khan ta/ sogs so// lung la/ 'phel ba yang na par byis pas/ a khAn+tita/ a ShA niSh+TaM/ a khA ni laHsogs sam/ a khA nIta/ sogs so// 
21a3(mdo 'grel): laliT la/ kita rnams la/ gam han dzan khan sogs kyi mdos u pa d+hA'i a dbyi ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ tsa la na/ tsi khyAm+ba tsa Sh+ThaHsogs so/ luT la// wal dang po'i iT byin pas/ kha ni tA/ sogs 
21a4(mdo 'grel): sa// ye ba~M b+hUSh+Ta/ yal 'damaka'o// byings lan rdzob/ dzan skyeb/ na kun nas gus pa rnams kyi rkyen ka 'gro ba'i me na ma yig dang bcan pa ral la yang at+pan+t+ra 'gyur te/ ston pa'i la la/ 
21a5(mdo 'grel): \u0f7f/ sogs sa pa/ kha AH/ sogs so// l+r-iT la/ Sha na~M b+h+yaH/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a kha ni Sh+ya/ sogs so// tsA 'i mchod pa dang zhi bdag la'olo zhes pa'ang bar sme pa da can yin 
21a6(mdo 'grel): ya srA ya sogs kyi lung 'dzin gyis in yangan par byas/ iT ma byin pa'i phyogs la/ wa sa dag gi thal la dbyi'o zhes ya dbyib sags kyis bsgrubs pas/ a nA yIta/ a nA mInAM/ ar+g+haM hU~M 
21a7(mdo 'grel): sogasas pa/ an+da nA~MH/ a n+d+raT+Ta/ a na suHsogs so// lejal/ tsa ma/ tsa suH sogs so// ladul/ iT ya na bar byas pas/ dzA ma~MH/ sogs sa pa/ rAH/ sogs so/ 
21b1(mdo 'grel): smon pa'i ling la/ nAM y+yata/ sogs so// liT la iT steng ba dang y+ra dbyi ba yang na bar byas pas/ tsA yi Sh+ya ti/ sogs sam/ tsA s+ya ti/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a nA yi Sh+yata/ sogs sam/ a ts+tsha 
21b2(mdo 'grel): s+yata/ sogs so// / laSha mdzes pa la'o zhes pa yang par smai pa da can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams 'jug ste/ byings thams cad pa bzhi po rnams la/ b+hU sha b+hU sha b+hU mu sogs kyi 'dos sha pa dang sh+yan 
21b3(mdo 'grel): yang na bar byas pas/ laT la/ la Sha ti/ sogs sam/ la Sh+ya ti/ sogs so/ de bzhin du/ ling la/ la She ta/ sogs sam/ la Sh+yeta/ sogs so/ loT la/ la She tu/ sogs sam/ la Sh+ya tu/ sogs 
21b4(mdo 'grel): so// lang la/ a la ShaH/ sogs sa pa/ al b+h+yaH/ sogs so// lung la/ wal dang po'i in byin 'phel ba yang na pang byas pas/ A maSh+NIH/ a / n+d+re/ a mraShIShaH sogs sam/ a laSh+TaH/ 
21b5(mdo 'grel): sogs so// laTi la/ la lA Sha/ leShatraHle ShuHsogs so// luT la wal dang po'i aTi byin pas/ la Shi tA sogs so// smon pa'i ling la/ lany+dzAta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la iTi sbyang bas/ la Shi Sh+yati/ 
21b6(mdo 'grel): sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing la/ a la ShiSh+yata/ sogs so// A du pa d+hA yA gohaHgo ta'i u pa d+hA'i Ata'o// rkyen a tsa dang po can pha rol la go ha ste/ gu hu kun nas sgrib pa'i u pa d+hA'i u yig ni 
21b7(mdo 'grel): Ata ste U ring por 'gyur te/ gu h+Na gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas// laTa'i par smai pa da la/ gA ha ti/ sogs dang / At+mane pa da rnams la/ gA ha te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ ling gi par sme rnams 
21b8(mdo 'grel): la/ g+hAHte/ sogs dang / mkhyen pa rnams la/ gAH/ sogs pa// laTa'i par ldarnams pa/ graH/ sogs dang / An+da rnams la/ b+h+yaH/ sogs so// lung la/ A 
22a1(mdo 'grel): sags pa da/ can pa dugs la ga nas ma sa zhug da/ khyen pa phyags pa na // \u0f7f// mthum 
22a2(mdo 'grel): sogs dang / At+ma ne rnams la/ a g+hu tiSh+Tha/ a g+na hi ShA tAM/ a gU ti Shata/ sogs so// iT med pa'i phyogs la/ iki u par+N+Na sha la iT med pa sogs kyisan+ni ka sa ru bsgyur/ ha'i 
22a3(mdo 'grel): rta'os/ haD+ha/ a tsa gcig pa'i ba sha'i b+ha Sha dz+nye Sha mtha'i sad+ha dag la'o zhes pa'i mdos ga g+ha/ sa la Sha r+d+ha dag gi ka 'o sa D+ha ka/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyis sa Shar bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ 
22a4(mdo 'grel): a g+hak+Shata/ a g+huk+ShaNAM/ a g+huk+Shan/ sogs dang / aTi med pa'i phyogs kyi At+man pa da la/ lu grA duta di ha li gur+b+he At+ma ne pa dang ni/ du ha di ta/ li ha gu ha rnams kyi At+ma ne pa dasal gnas pa la 
22a5(mdo 'grel): yang na 'jig go/ du ha 'jo ba/ de he nye bar gsog pa/ li ha ro myang ba/ gu h+ma kun nas sgrib pa rnams la/ pha rol gyi tsA bsgyur ba'i kla ni rnam dbye AMt+ma ne pa daso la gnas pa 'am so las skyes pa'i yi ge dang po can pha rol 
22a6(mdo 'grel): la yang na 'jig ste/ kla mi 'jig pa'i phyogs kyi skyes bu dang po'i gcig tshig la/ a g+hA k+Shata/ kla 'jig pa'i phyogs la/ ha'i D+ha'o sa da han+ta/ d+hA min pa sogs kyis ta d+ha/ 'irgyalas rnams so la gnas nas pas 
22a7(mdo 'grel): Sha Tul / Sha Tu 'os d+har+d+ha D+ha'i rnal dbyi 'os/ rta gong ma byas/ DUrA byis pa la snga ma'i aN gyi ring po'o zhes pa'i mdos u ring por bsgyur ba sogs kyis bsgribs pas/ a g+hA D+ha/ kla s+yA tsi/ kwa'i a tsa la'o// 
22a8(mdo 'grel): liha sogs las pha rol gyi ts+li'i 'gyur ba'i kwa'i mtha' rnam dbye At+man par a tsa dang po can rnams pha rol la dbyi ste/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ a g+hA k+ShA tAM/ ag+hA k+Sha te/ yang 'grel par 
22b1(mdo 'grel): aHda pa yin kyang mang tshig la tha'i mtha' 'ga' zhig kyi bar mi 'ad nas bshad pas/ ag+na na/ 'khrab// rtag rnams dpa'adra bar byas pas/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ a g+hu rnArmas b+hU 
22b2(mdo 'grel): ag+nak+ShaH/ mat+man/ ar+d+han/ skyes tha bye ma gsam la/ sarbA ta/ at+mA// ma k+ShAH/ l-i tsA par ste pa rnams pa/ dzaT+TaH/ drAk+Sha ma/ dzA r+dz+dza ru ga / dza~M g+huH 
22b3(mdo 'grel): sogs dang / At+man pad rnams la/ dzAg+h+raH/ dzu g+hAr+NaH/ dzug ti/ dzu grA t-i'aM/ dz+ra graSh+Na/ sogs sa// luT la iT yang na par byas pas/ g+hu he tA/ grA hi ShI rA/ g+hu d+hiSh+Tha 
22b4(mdo 'grel): g+hu hrI se/ sogs sam/ grAn+d+ha/ g+hAn+ta re/ g+hu d+haHgrA nA me/ sogs so// At+pat+pa la yang ts+tsha \u0f7f/ g+hA ti t+ta da~M/ grA Sh+ThaH/ gU hi t+ta saM/ sogs sam/ g+hun/ g+hur+d+ha rau/ krAr+d+haH/ g+hAn+tas 
22b5(mdo 'grel): g+hA ti ShI ran/ sogs sam/ g+huk+ShIn+da/ b+hu k+Shi yA s+t+waM/ g+hu k+Shi ran/ sogs so// l+r-iT la yang iT yang na par byas pas par smai pa da rnams la/ g+hu tsi d+yati/ grA ti d+yataH/ grA ti D+yanAM/ sogs sam/ g+hu/

22b7(mdo 'grel): pa da rnams la/ e gU hi Sh+yata/ a gU hi Sh+ya tAM/ a gU hi Sh+yan/ sogs sam/ a g+hu k+Sh+yata/ a g+hu k+ShA tAM/ a g+hu k+ShAn/ sogs so// At+ma ne rnams la/ a gA hi Sh+ya ta/ a gU hi Sh+ye tAM/ a gU ti b+han+ta/ 
23a1(mdo 'grel): sogs sam/ a g+nak+ShA ta/ a g+huk+She tAM/ ag+na kAn/ sogs so// / hr-inya 'phrog pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pas laT sogs par smai pa da rnams dang / At+ma ne pad rnams

23a6(mdo 'grel): sitsa rnam dbye At+man pa da pha rol can dang / smon pa'i ling At+ma ne rnams kyang ka 'gro ba'i ming can zhes brda chad byed de dgos pa ni 'phel ba dang yon tan mi byed pa'i don te/ hr-i nya la lung At+ma ne rnams sbyar bas/ skyes bu dang po

23b2(mdo 'grel): ba/ dza hi ri ma/ de bzhin du/ At+man pa de'i skyes bu dang po gsum la/ dza tre/ dza hA te/ dza hri re/ skyes bu dbus ma gsum la/ dza ha ri She/ dza hA the/ dza ha ri d+he/ dza ha ri n+de/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum/

25b1(mdo 'grel): b+hak+Sh+ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ l+r-ing gi a tang la/ a b+hak+ShAta/ sogs dang / tang la/ a b+hak+Sh+ya ta/ sogs so// shInya bsten pa la'o zhes pa'ang gnyis ka'i tshig can yin pa sa laT sogs 
25b2(mdo 'grel): pa ra smai pa da dang At+ma ne pa da gnyis ka 'jug ste/ laTa'i a tang la/ shra ya ti/ sogs dang / tang la/ shra ya te/ sogs so// de bzhin du/ lang gi a tang la/ shra yeta/ sogs dang / tang la/

25b4(mdo 'grel): lung la/ Ni shr-i dru sogs kyis tr-I tsang du bsgyur/ tsang la 'os/ byings gnyis brjod/ dang po'i hal lhag po ngos/ ra phyis/ atsa la byings shU sogs kyi i ya sogs kyis bsgrubs pas/ a tang la/ 
25b5(mdo 'grel): a shi shri yata/ a shai shri ya tAM/ a shaM shri yan/ sogs dang / tang la/ a shi shri yata/ a shi shri yatAM/ a shaM shri yan+ta/ sogs so// laT la 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan can ma yin pa rnams la/ swa 
25b6(mdo 'grel): las brtsegs pa la li Ta'i ke ta/ yang na'o zhes pas lung 'dren gyi keta kye brda chad yang na bar byas pas/ ki kyi phyogs la i ya dad kita ma yin pa'i phyogs la yon tan byed de/ A tang gi skyes bu dang po gsum la/

30a8(mdo 'grel): dz+nyA ba yai bAd+hi/ bkri bi \u0f7f ti br-i bA ti pr-i che ti/ hUM nyi rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la'ang // gra hanye bar len pa/ dz+wa la tshanyams pa/ ba ye ste/ benya ska la ma'i rgyud bya d+ha bstun pa/ bsha mdzes pa'i badz+ri/ bi tsir tha dad du gyu 
30b1(mdo 'grel): ba/ za sh+tsa gcod pa/ pratsA shes par 'dod pa/ b+hag+na 'tshed pa rnams kyi ya Na so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams ni rkye dka 'gro ba'i ming can dang / nga 'gro ba'i ming can rnams pha rol la saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyu ro/ li Ti ba yo 
30b2(mdo 'grel): liTal ba yaM'i ya'o// bshad ma thag pa gra ti dz+nyA ba yi/ sogs kyi mdos/ ba ya'i ya yang i ru 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal/ laT kita pha rol la ba ya'i ya yig ni saM pra sA ra Nar 'gyur ba ma yin no// bshA

35b8(mdo 'grel): la/ Ar+t+ti/ / ga kyi lag sa gas ga cisas/ gas te// thag sa 'am/ ma sa gas kyisas/ aSh+TaH/ aSh+Ta/ uH/ skyes bu phyi ma gsum la/ a be bA ni/ bsheg/ 'awe ba shA ma/ lang gi skyes bu dang /

36b1(mdo 'grel): ldan dz+ha la kang 'gro ba la dbyi'o// a nudAt+ta nye ba'i yul te/ ya mu nye bar 'gog pa/ ra mu rtse ba/ nam rab tu 'dud pa/ gap+l-i 'gro ba/ han 'tshe ba/ ma nu shes pa rnams dang / ba no ti ste/ ba nu 'tshe ba dang / ta no ti la sogs

40b3(mdo 'grel): a b+h+yA sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la 'os i gong ma i yang ra dang a 'gro ba rim pa bzhin drangs pas i yA ya/ dir+g+ha i NaHki ti/ ka 'gro ba la iN gyi ring po'o// liT ka 'gro ba'i ming can pha rol la iN gyi a b+h+yA sa 
40b4(mdo 'grel): ring por 'gyur te/ skyes bu dang po'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ i gnyis brjod mdo 'dis a b+h+yA sa ring po/ iN kyi yaN 'os a phyi ma y+ra drangs pas/ I ya tuH/ I yuH/ de rnams dang 'dra bar bsgrubs 
40b5(mdo 'grel): sa tha gsapa// Sh+NI / smra na

40b8(mdo 'grel): nI yAta/ sogs so// l+r-iT la yon tan byas pas/ e Sh+ya ti/ e Sh+ya taH/ e Sh+yan+ti/ sogs dang / l+r-inga'ang de dang 'dra ba la/ atse dang po'i AT byin/ AT las kyang ngos 'phel ba byas pas/ ai Sh+yata/

150b7(mdo 'grel): yang na bar byas pas/ si tsa'i phyogs la iT byin pas/ a d+hA na yA ti/ a d+hA na yaiSh+TAM/ a d+hA na yi ShuHsogs so// tsang gi phyogs la byings gnyis brjod/ ha la dang po sogs kyi sa ba phyis/ a ka ma byis pa 
150b8(mdo 'grel): la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos ir bstAr/ Ni'i iT med pa la 'os Ni phyis pas/ a di d+hA na ta/ a di d+ha na tAM/ a di d+ha nan/ sogs so// liT la Am sbyar bas/ d+hA na yAM tsa kA ra/ sogs so// luT la

266a7(mdo 'grel): bltas na nor pa'i blo// ji snyed 'jig rten 'phrul pa'i sems// me long g.ya' dang mapa'i' sprin bzhin// rig dang ma rig gnyis med pas// phyogs gcig rkyen gyi dus su 'phrul// 'jig rten brtan g.yol sogs pa// snang ba nyid nadang / 
266b1(mdo 'grel): bzhin med// rang byung phyi nang med snang phyir// de dus rang bzhin nyams pa med// 'jug pa'i rnam shes de lta ba// shes rab thun mong spyan yin no// rang byung ye shes tshogs kun bdag/ shes rab can gyi mchog yin no// 
266b2(mdo 'grel): rdo rje yid ni dbang mchog phyir// lta ba med phyir dang spyi chos// dbyer med phyogs lha'i 'od bral bas// ma nor rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs// gsum gnyis gcig gi the tshom yang // dang po dngos dang gsal ba dang // snga ma 
266b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas sems can dang // so so sems rgyud tha dad pa// gcig na bdun la snga rtog skye// de bzhin sems rgyud brgyad la za// tha dad zhe na bdun gyis 'gal// de bas dgag dang sgrub med pa'i// gcig dang du ma med pa'o// / 
266b4(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'i snga ma rtog skyon dgu// phyi ma med pa'i the tshom dag/ skyon gyi dngos po bcu gnyis shing // mi mkhas mkhas pa'i bsam pa ni// mi mkhas shin tu mi mkhas pa// shin tu mi mkhas mthar lta ba// mi mkhas yod 
266b5(mdo 'grel): med brtsod byed cing // dgag cing bsgrub pa gang byed pa// de de de la chags sdang skye// mkhas dang shin tu mkhas pa ni// mkhas pa phal la dgag sgrub can// sgrub pa'i don la brten par byed// byas pa'i bzung 'dzin dbang gyur 
266b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i// mnor lam dang bral ba yin// shin tu mkhas pa thams cad la// sems kyir dag bsgrub pa med// de la rang rig dang snang phyir// dgag zlab bral la yid mi ston// de phyir so sa dgag bsgrub can// sgrub pa'i 
266b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir// de de med pa gal mthong // de bas rang gi brtags mthong yi// de de skas gdang ji lta ba// khyad par grangs dang dor ba med// cha yod du ga la mi 'thung bzhin// log lta gnyis su ga la 'gyur// gnyis 
266b8(mdo 'grel): po de ltar de nyid la// grub pa'i tha snyad ji ltar mtshon// ma grub grub na nges tshig med// de ma grub na de bzhin no// de bas srid dang mi srid kun// spyan grub phyogs su grub pa med// bzhi pa snga ma skyon drug gnyis// de bzhin phyi ma 
267a1(mdo 'grel): rjesu 'thun// gnyis med zhen dus gsum lung // 'byung zhes bya ba'ang gnyis med dang // sman nyid pan gnod bdag gnas ltang // ngo bos tha dad 'gyur ba med// phyogs las logs pa'i tha 
267a2(mdo 'grel): da med// lnga pa 'khrul gzhi yod med pa'i// rkyen ni gsum pa ji bzhin grangs// mig yor gsum la dngos med 'dra'i// chos yod bzhin pas rang sems la// de dngos med kyang rgyu rkyen drug/ rang bzhin lhun 'grub 
267a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'ching 'grol dbyer med la// gnyis mthong 'khrul par blta ba 'khrul// de bas blang dang dor ba med// bde sdug gnas su ris ma blta// bdun pa rang rig can yin na// de lta skyon bcu 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 
267a4(mdo 'grel): kyi ye shes 'di// mi lnga'i bdag po kun gyi sems// rang spyi ji snyed ji lta ba// rang yul med par nges gsal ba// na mkha' sprin mthong 'od bzhin du// rab rib gang dag shes rab snang // brgyad pa des mthong sgrib pa'i 
267a5(mdo 'grel): grangs// brgyad pa bsnyad pa yan lag bcas// phyag rgya bzhi yi bzhir gyur pa// nges par zos zin bya bar bsnyad// ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal// the tshom nyid kyang nges pa'i spyan// log rtog nyid kyang ma nor lam// de la mi 
267a6(mdo 'grel): rim pa yod med khyad par dang // ltos pas phye ba'i khyad par ni// bdag spong bdag med sgrub pa dang // gzugs spong phyi stong sgrub pa dang // don 'gog sems tsam sgrub pa dang // mtha' spong mtha' bral sgrub pa dang // dri spong dag 
267b1(mdo 'grel): pa sgrub pa dang // mtshan 'gog mtshan med sgrub pa dang // blang dor 'gog med sgrub pa dang // rtsol spong rtsol bral sgrub pa dang // de dag kun kyang yod med phyir// dgag sgrub rang gis mi byed pa'o// rim par phye ba'i khyad par ston// 
267b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par gsal// kun shes bzhin 'dra rab rib dri ma nyid// bstan pa'i me long mthong goms rang dag sar// 'gyur bas ma 'ongs de can ched bgyis pa'i// dge rtsas bdag dang mtha' yas grol bar bsngo// 'phrul gyi me long 
267b3(mdo 'grel): dgu bskor rdzogs s+ho// / 'am@#/ @##rnal 'byor rigs pa'i me tog 'phrul gyi me long la dbu zhabs su 
267b4(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa'i don bzhi ste// phyag 'tshal mchod pa'i lung dang // dam bca' sdom pa'i lung dang // gzhung lugs rtsa ba'i lung dang // bsngo ba tshogs kyi lung dang bzhi'o// kun mkhyen nyid la phyag 'tshal nas// shes pa gang gis gang ltar 
267b5(mdo 'grel): byung pa'i ldu 'a// la/ 'i yal kye+e gan kyi shU pa s+ho// ma ga gan du ga pa mas // yang chu tsun pa sate/ 
267b6(mdo 'grel): lung dang lan no// dris pa ni dgu ste/ log rtog byang chub yul snang ba'i// chos kun sems su gcig mi gcig/ ces pa/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul byang chub sems su gcig mi gcig dris pa dang po'o// lhun gyis 
267b7(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa gang la bgyi dris pa gnyis pa'o// de nyid snang ba yod dam med// ces pa/ lhun grub snang stong gang yin dris pa gsum pa'o// ye nas sangs rgyas yin nam min// zhes pa/ chos kun gzhi yi sangs rgyas pa yin nam// 
268a1(mdo 'grel): ma rgyas pa yin dris pa bzhi pa'o// khams gsum sems can ji ltar 'khrul// ces pa lnga pa'o// 'khrul pa nyid don ci lags/ shes pa/ 'khrul pa'i grub mtha' dris pa drug pa'o// rnal 'byor 
268a2(mdo 'grel): lta ba'i ngo bo gang / zhes pa bdun pa'o// de dag dgos pa'i the tsom gang / zhes pa/ skyon dris pa brgyad pa'o// de rnams khyad par ji ltar che// bdun po theg pa gzhan las gang spags dris pa dgu pa'o// 'khrul pa'i me long dgu 
268a3(mdo 'grel): bskor bzhin// zhes pa/ mtshon pa'i dgus mtshon du btub pa'o// gsal byed 'khrul tshig dgu yis ston// zhes pa/ don dris pa lan zung dgu yi tshig gis gsal bar ston pa'o// lan dang po bstan pa'i phyir// sgyu ma rnam 
268a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis spyod yul ni// sems kyi chos nyid ngang du gcig/ ces pa/ log rtog sgyu ma'i sems can dang // ye shes sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas kyi dpyod yul 'khrul lam ma 'phrul gnyis// sems kyi de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 
268a5(mdo 'grel): su gcig par lan gdab po// de'i dpe ni/ de'i de nyid ji lta ba'o// mkha' dang gzha' snang ji bzhin du/ zhes pa/ gzha' tshon snang ba dang rang bzhin stong pa dbyer med pa bzhin// gtan tshigs ni/ log rtog sems rgyud tha dad
268a6(mdo 'grel): kyang / rigs rgyud med phyir dbye ba dka'/ zhes pa/ log rtog gi rgyud so sor rtog pa dang / 'du shes tha dad pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du byed de lta ba dang / rgyal ba'i thugs gsal brtags kyis tha dad pa las mi mthun pa ni 
268a7(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba dang 'gro ba la rigs rgyud rtag par red pa med pa'i phyir/ gcig ces dgos ches gnyis kyi phyir brjod kyis ngo bo gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i ngang du dbyer med pa la de skad brjod pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ sems nyid nor bu rin po che// 
268a8(mdo 'grel): zhes pa/ spyan grub kyi dpa'o// ji ltar dmigs shing bsams par snang // zhes pa/ lhun gyi mgrub pa dang mgrub pa'i chos thams cad du sems so sor snang ba'o// 'grol sems rgyu gnyis mi 'chang // zhes pa 
268b1(mdo 'grel): sems kun gyi sems kyi chos nyid kyi gzhi 'am dngos po zhes pa skad cig ma ni bsam pa'am blo zhes rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i sems rgyud gnyis pa 'gro ba gcig la med de/ skabs kyis mi brjod pa'o// de ni dngos med kun gyi gzhi

268b6(mdo 'grel): dmangs pa 'am gzhis med/ kun ba tho ma bsam pa sa yad ces ba dag se mkhas pa'i shes pas/ 'dis dang/ sems 'di sa da med do nas/ klas pa rnams ni rjed par byed/ zhes pa la sogs pas gsalal//

268b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshig gnyis kar/ sems 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dbyer med la mi bsam mi brjod do// gtsang dang mi gtsang dngos gcig bzhin/ zhes pa/ gnyis su med pa'i dpe ste/ la la'i gtsang ba la la la'i mi gtsang

271b4(mdo 'grel): 'gegs pa dang / dgag sgrub med pa'i don sgrub pa yod mod kyang / dgag sgrub med pa'i phyogs gcig pur khas mi len te/ don ni de dang rang rig rang snang phyir/ dgag sgrub med pa'i yid mi rten/ zhes pa/ dgag sgrub 
271b5(mdo 'grel): yod med kyi chos thams cad dang rig pa yin pas/ dgag sgrub med pa'i don tshad du dmigs pa yul du mi byed do// dgag sgrub gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus dang / mnyam pa la bzhag pa'i dus gnyis ka ched du byed pa 'khrul po'i 
271b6(mdo 'grel): phyir/ de phyir so so dgag bsgrub can/ bsgrub pa'i phyogs la zhen pa'i phyir/ de de med pa gal mthong / de bas rang gi brtags mthong yin/ zhes gsungaso// lan dgu pa zhar la bstan pa'i phyir/ de de ska/ sa gdang rdzi 
271b7(mdo 'grel): ba/ khyad par grangs dang dor ba med/ zhes pa/ rgyu'i theg pa de dang / 'bras bu de skas gdang ltar khyad yod pa'i grangs mi 'dor bas/ bdun po'i skyon rgyu'i theg pa la grangs ji ltar brjod pa ltar 'byung gi/ 'bras bu'i theg pa la 
271b8(mdo 'grel): skyon mi 'byung bar smos pa'o// dgos ched ni/ cha yod dug la mi rtab bzhin// log lha gnyis su gal 'gyur/ zhes pa/ des de bzhin du rang bzhin log pa dang / ltos pa'i log pa ltar gsang sngags mi 'gro ba'o// gnyis 
272a1(mdo 'grel): pa tha tsham gsas pa'i phyir/ gnyis padelta la/ zhes pa/ grangs kyi gnyis pa d+ma ltar ldan gru pa dres pa/ thub pa'i tha skad ltar mtshan/ zhes pa/ sman gyis grub pa byugs 
272a2(mdo 'grel): gcig pa 'am/ phyogs med pa gang yin dris pa'o// mgrub grub na nges tshig med/ ces pa/ phyogs med na grub pa'i ngangal nyal glang ma grub pa la sogs pa yang grub pas/ grub pa gcig pu'i nges tshig med par 
272a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyuro// de ma grub na de bzhin no// zhes pa/ mgrub par grags pa'i chos lhun gyis mgrub na'ang / ma grub pa'i chos ma rdzogs pas nges tshig med do// gzhan yang mgrub pa phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas yod mthar lta 
272a4(mdo 'grel): phyogasu grub pa med/ zhes pa/ lhun grub kyi gtan tshigs kyis dge bas mtho ris su srid pa la sogs pa dang / dge bas ngan song du mi srid pa kun yod med grub ma grub dbyer med pa la dgos ched kyis ldan grub du brjod kyis 
272a5(mdo 'grel): don grub grub por brjod pa med pas/ lhag pa'i lhun grub la skyon de dag mi 'byung / bzhi pa'i snga ma skyon drug gnyis/ shes pa/ ye sangs rgyas pa phyogs gcig pa cig rin chen gling dang / nyi mas mtshon pa sgra ji bzhin du brtags

272a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i snang ba 'gag/ gal ten brgyud pa yang 'khor/ 'khor ba la thog ma 'byung / gzhil 'khor ba med la blo la yod na blo dang gzhi tha dad pa'i skyon 'ong / tha mi dad na blol yod pa bzhin du gzhi la yang yod par 'gyur/ de nyid dang gzhan du 
272b1(mdo 'grel): brjod du med pa yin zhen/ de nyid ma yin pas gzhil med kyang / gzhan du brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis gzhil yod par 'gyur/ sgrub sngags gnyis pa des ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyang min no// de bzhin phyi ma rjes su 'thun/

277a7(mdo 'grel): yi gzhung lugs kyang // kun rtags snang ba'i spyod yul 'di// dam pa gzhan dbang sgyu ma tsam// shes snang ma yin 'du snang yin// dam par skye med smra bsams 'das// rten 'brel cig dang du ma med// 
277b1(mdo 'grel): rdo rje gzegs ma rnam bzhi dang // mu bzhi skye 'gag la sogs pas// mtha' yis bye brag sel byed cing // de 'dra bsam gtan 'das chen cing // snang ba yod dang med pa dang // rigs pas 'grub dang ma grub sogs// de 
277b2(mdo 'grel): dag la rtsod mtha' tshol ba// snyed nas nges 'jog bzung 'dzin can// bden gnyis ngo bo cig mi gcig/ rtsod cing cig la bden dang rdzun// rigs lta cha shes zhen pa can// gcig na rdzun mthong bden thal 'gyur// yang na 
277b3(mdo 'grel): bden mthong brdzun par 'gyur// brdzun bzhi bden par bslu sogs lngar// thal 'gyur bden bzhin brdzun pa'ang // skye 'gag med sogs bzhir thal 'gyur// yang na mnyam bzhag tshe na'ang // bden gnyis dus gcig 
277b4(mdo 'grel): mthong bar rigs// bden brdzun phan tshun spangs pas 'gal// tha dad gyur na sgyu ma la// brten nas don dam mi rtogs shing // sgyu mar 'bad pasa'ang tshe chad 'gyur// dam pa btsal ba'i gnas med cing // 'grel 
277b5(mdo 'grel): pa med pas mi 'gyur// gang ma gyes pa'ang // sde ba med par 'grub mi 'gyur// zhen slong gnyen po mi btubatsang // nyid ring cu can byur pas// gang la phan gnod med 'gyur ro// de ltar rtog cing the tshom pa/ 
277b6(mdo 'grel): khas blangs med snga phyogs la zhen// de bas bla med theg pa pa// don dam duni dbyer med te// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// don dam du ni kor 
277b7(mdo 'grel): bdun no// kun rdzob du ni mnyam rdzogs so// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob du'ang dbyer med te// lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// de nyid 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la// don dam ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu// lhag pa'i 
277b8(mdo 'grel): bden par mtshan brjod do// cir yang snang ba'i ye shes nyid// mtshan mar ma 'gags cing yang snang // ngo bo ma nges don mdzad dang // rtag pa gnyis las ring ba dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'i yul 'thun dang // snang la 
278a1(mdo 'grel): ste 'gag med pa'i phyir// lhag pa'i phun rdzob zhes su grags// thams cad kun gyi dang bzhin pas// ye shes snang ba 'ang rkyen med// kye 'jig med do lnga 'bras bu// dbyings dang ye 
278a2(mdo 'grel): chos drug ldan phyir lhag par bsgrags// de bzhin rang bzhin 'bras bu dang // ye shes gsum phyir don dam pa'ang // shes don nang nas mchog gyur pas// don gyi ming du 'grub pa yin// de'ang ma skyes dbyings kyi don// 
278a3(mdo 'grel): gzhi yis nges la byad gyung pa// log rtog spyod yul la sogs pa// kun gyi rang bzhin phyogs bkol med// ngo bo bdun rdzogs dmigs pa med// mtshan nyid kun grol kun bdag la// phyogs stong chad par yod pa med// 
278a4(mdo 'grel): kun byin ldan pa'i brlabs snang la// dngos po gnyis kyi ngo bo'i rgyur// gyur pas ci yang mi 'gog ste// rgya mtsho'i chu dang brlabs bzhin no// yid bzhin nor ltar re ba skong ba'o// yon tan kun rdzogs phyir snang ba'o// 
278a5(mdo 'grel): thun mong dam pa'i yul mini te// phyogs cig mtha' bral ma yin te// dpe dang gtan tshigs thun mong pas// gtan la 'bebs pa ma yin te// bdun sogs ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir// lhag pa'ang grangs mthun ni 
278a6(mdo 'grel): du brjod// rnal sogs spyod yul ma yin no// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud med// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yi nag 
278a7(mdo 'grel): yang med// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad la// rang byung chen pos kun tu khyab// rang byung de nyid dngos med pas// chos dang gang zag bdag 
278b1(mdo 'grel): med pa// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin no// ma skyes bzhi la dgrod pa'i lam// gang spangs gang thob de'i 'bras bu// dngos po ji bzhin mi mthong bas// 'bras bu btags pa'i sangs rgyas tsam// de ltar nges 'byung bye 
278b2(mdo 'grel): brag gi/ rgud nas nges pa'i gsang ba'ang // dang po rgyu 'bras dbye byed pas// 'bras bu lam du byed zhe'ang // phyogs gcig dag chos nyid la// lha zhing de las lha drug sogs// dmigs pa gsum dang yan lag gis// 
278b3(mdo 'grel): bsgom byed 'bras bu bzung 'dzin can// lta spyod ya cha'i zhen pa yis// bdag nyid chen po nang mi mthong // dag pa'i sems zhi rtsol ba'i lam// rdo rje gsum gyis 'dzin pa// rma long 'dri mkhan dang mtshungs te// 
278b4(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po'i thugs rje'i yul// gnyi ga pa yi bya ba dang // rnal 'byor rjes su lta spyod 'brang // gnyis po ya cha sngon bzhin te// de nyid bzhi yi zhen pa can// de'ang phyi rol pa la gnas// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin/ 
278b5(mdo 'grel): na/ ma na sa na sa la/ 
278b6(mdo 'grel): len gtsang skad yin// chu yi ral gri byas pa bzhin// spyod par ma bod 'dzin pa can// de nyid sto nas ma spyod// shin tan de rnam gtogs pas// phyi mam yis bcings pa yin// 'od gsal bzhi 
278b7(mdo 'grel): mtshan mang ga yo// snang stong des slob lam la yas// thob pa dam pa'ang ste pa'i gnas// phyi rom gnyis sogs 'bras bu'i phyir// 'ching bu rin chen rdo lta bar// lam 'bras ma 'brel 'khrul par zad/ 
278b8(mdo 'grel): mchog bshad par kha sa blangs pa// rgyas par gdams kyi gdengs du bgyis// rnal 'byor chen po lta ba'i don// yod las btsal na sgros btags te// med las btsal na bkur btab 'gyur// yod med gnyis 
279a1(mdo 'grel): sa ca n+d+has na// sa dum pan drung // de la gnan 'ad 'thas med pas// nas yang brnyed par mi 'byu ste// mapa' sa rtsod kun sabs// gsas rgyas rdzogs / 
279a2(mdo 'grel): mtha' bral ba// rang blo 'khrul pa snang ba yin// de bas mthar thug ltos yod pa// kun kyang mtha' yis bral ba'ang mtha'// yin phyir nges pa'i blo mi bzhag/ gnyis med smras pas ma bral ba ltos// tshig dang 
279a3(mdo 'grel): sgra 'thun tha dad pa// lta spyod log par drangs thabs su// gsung phyir rdo rje theg chen po// sgra cig don gyis khyad par rtogs// dang po chos kun gnas bubs nyid// dang por mtshan cing dngos bzlog dang // gnyis
279a4(mdo 'grel): par yang dag bden bral don// mtshon phyir ma skyes de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid dang snang ba med// gnyis su med dang mnyam pa nyid// ci'ang min dang smras bsams 'das// mi gnas mi dmigs mi rtog dang / 
279a5(mdo 'grel): mtha' bral rnam par dag pa dang // mtshan med ston pa med pa dang // chos nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid dang // spros bral 'gro 'ong med pa dang // snang dang 'gag med thob pa med// rdol dang thang dang thob pa dang // kun rdzo 
279a6(mdo 'grel): don dam bden pa dang // mchags pa dang rang bzhin dang // dngos med zhen med rigs pa dang // bdag med gzhan med spyod yul med// lta ba rig pa ye shes sogs// mtshon pa'i sgra grags chos rnams kyi// dang 
279a7(mdo 'grel): rang don rnams tha dad pa// byed par ma 'dres gsal bya'i phyir// rig pas mdotsam gyogs brjod pa// dang po rgyun gyis log rtog chos// bkag pas la phyogs gcig ma skyes dang // dri ma ma skyes mtshan ma min 
279a8(mdo 'grel): ched du byas pa ma skyes rnams// skyes spong ma skyes 'dod pa yis// srin bu bal bzhin bcings par zad// ji snyed tha dad chos rnams kun// gnyis med blang dor med pa yis// lhag pa ma skyes don mchog ni// skyes 
279b1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid na skye ba med// dbyings phyogs ma skyes de bzhin nyid// rig pa nyid dang yod ye shes 'dod// blang dor med pa'i de bzhin nyid// gnyis med ma byas ma bcos pa// smra bsams 'das pa'i gtso mchog go/ de 
279b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin stong nyid zhen pa'ang // phyogs stong gsal stong la sogs las// rnam pa'i mchog ldan stong chen po// yod pa nyid na stong pa nyid// yod dang med dbus smra bsams 'das// ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang // byin 
279b3(mdo 'grel): brlabs la sogs khyad par 'phags// snang ba med ces brjod pa yang // ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// snang la med lta bus pa med// phyogs cig snang med phyogs rig med// brdzun pa gsal ba snang med dang / 
279b4(mdo 'grel): snang ba dri ma med pa dang // mtshan snang med pa la sogs pa// ched byas snang rtags kun par zad// snang tshogs snang ba dang bcas pa'i// snang ba med pa'i mchog 'di ni// snang ba yod med dbyer med pas// 'di
279b5(mdo 'grel): ltar snang zhes bsam du med// gnyis su med par bstan pa yang // phyogs stong gnyis med yul sems med// phyogs cig bral ba'i gnyis med pa// de kun gnyis pa'i gtso mchog go/ don dang 'dod pa yod phyir ro// / 
279b6(mdo 'grel): saseM pa yang / smras pa/ nga// do kyi pa chags ga / ga/ sa 
279b7(mdo 'grel): yis// stan grub blang dor med pa dang // gzugs brnyan nor bus mtshon pa'o// tshe phyir mnyam nyid gsungs pa dang // 'dra ba'i mnyam pa mi mnyam chos// mi mnyam bral ba'i phyogs mnyam ni// mnyam pa'i mtha' 
279b8(mdo 'grel): sa su sa su sa su du sus su su sa 
280a1(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa'ang // rigs pas ma yin shes pa la// yin par snang la skyon lta bar// mtha' sel phyogs cig ma yin dang // dmigs pa ma yin kun kyang mtha'// blang 
280a2(mdo 'grel): dor med sogs mi gsum ldan// ci'ang min zhen brjod pa'ang // ci'i nga yin pa'i dngos gzhi can// yin min dbyer med cha shas bral// phyogs su thugs pa 'di la med// rma gyi'i mdongs rtse kha dog 'dra// dgos 
280a3(mdo 'grel): ched sngon bzhin sbubs ma 'das// bden pa phyogs cig de bzhin pa// khung bar chu blugs bzhin 'dod pa// phyogs chas smra bas ma yul las 'das// rtog ge'i yul dAng smra'o// me gsum ldan pa'i don mchog ni// 
280a4(mdo 'grel): spabs ma kun dngos smrab sam dka'// blo ngan yul du ma gyur pas// na mkha' 'di zhes dka' dang 'dra// mag rtog phyogs rigs rnal 'byor dang // phyogs gsal me gnas rten pa can// phye ba 'ang 'dzin pa'i 
280a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi can// gnas pa'i gtso bor bdag gi brjod// thang med dor med mi gnas pa// bsgom bya sems phyir brtan bral ba// gnas dang mi gnas spong len med// ci la'ang yid rten mi 'cha' bas// mi gnas nyid la 
280a6(mdo 'grel): gnas mi byed// rten dang rten can med pa ni// mi gnas chen po mchog yin te// nam mkha' lta bu rten dang bral// gang gi mi dmigs shes brjod pa'ang // log dang 'jig rten ting 'dzin dang // 'gog gnyis 
280a7(mdo 'grel): phyogs cig la gnas dang // dbu ma dag mi dmigs gsum// 'dod las gsel ba'i dmigs pa can// phyogs cig rten med dmigs pa'o// dmigs pa kun bdag mi dmigs la// mtshon chen can du de 
280a8(mdo 'grel): brjod kyang // med dmigs 'dod pa'i chags pa med// dmigs so ni sdang phrag dog med// gnyis su med par mi dmig pa la// mkhara' la 'di zhes dmigs bral 'dra'o// rnam par martog brjod pa'ang / 
280b1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten zhen pa'i rnam mi tog/ log par skom pa mi rtog dang // byis pa dgag sgrub mi tog gnyis// phyogs 'dzin gsal ba mi rtog pa// rnam dag gsal ba mi rtog rnams// bzhi la rtog pa med smra zhing / 
280b2(mdo 'grel): mi rtog mi mthun bgegs lta ba pa// dgag sgrub blang dor byed pa de// des mchog bzhi yi rtog pa can// thabs chen rnam par mi rtog pa// rtogs tshogs ming tsam ye shes phyir// rtog pa nyid nas ma skyes pas// 
280b3(mdo 'grel): skyes brda'i 'du shes dbye ba med// dgag dang sgrub med mi rtog pa// mi rtog nyid du'ang rtog med par// me long nag la rtog med bzhin// grol rtogs bya phyir mtha' bral ba// mtha' zhes thub par grags pa 
280b4(mdo 'grel): rnams// log pa'i mtha' gnyis bral gzugs med// skye 'gag cha shas bral ba dang // rang rig mtha' brgyad bzhi gnyis bral// mtha' la skyon du rtog byed cing // mtha' bral yon tan len byed pa// 
280b5(mdo 'grel): ltos pas thub pa yod pa'i phyir// mtha' brab nyid kyang mtha'i gtso// kun rdzob shes yul byed pas 'khrul// yang dag mtha' bral shes bya ba' // mtha' brgyad la sogs grags pa rnams// rang 
280b6(mdo 'grel): rig ye shes snang ba'i phyir// spros pa thugs rje'i dus nyid na// ming tsam der red med pa'i phyir// mtha' dang bral ba gnyis su med// sman zhes bya ba'i ga bur dus// grang ba'i dug dang gnyis med ltar// 
280b7(mdo 'grel): bral rjes brjed pa de kho na// thug pa'i mtha' dang dbyed med pa// gang du'ang thug pa med pa'i phyir// mtha' bral bla mar bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor dag pa sbyang bya dag/ mthong skom lam gyi spong bya zhing / 
280b8(mdo 'grel): sngags dang phyag tu skyong ra mi dag/ dag 'dod dri med chags pas bcings// zag pa'i rnam dag zhen pa can// dang rang kun tu brtags pas nan// 'og mas smad pa'i dri ma rnams// dri ma nyid na rnam dag cing // 
281a1(mdo 'grel): blang dor gnyis su med pa la// dag dang ma dag ris med pas// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse ste// 'dam skyes pad+ma ji bzhin no// mtshan ma med pa'i rim pa yang // grags pa'i 
281a2(mdo 'grel): mtshan med 'dod pa yis// spong dang spel bas phyogs cig pa// 'du shes yul la skyon lta zhing // de med pa la mchog gzhol byed// 'dod dang zhen pa'i bzung 'dzin can// phyi yi bya ba rnal 'byor kyang // de 
281a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs mthun mtshan phyir na brdzun// mchog gi mtshan ma med ces pa// 'du shes kun bdag rang rig phyir// yul med de la 'dzin pa med// de nas phyogs kyi mtshan 'dzin bral// de bzhin smon pa med pa 
281a4(mdo 'grel): yang // blo chung ltos pa'i smon byed dang // bsal dang len dang smon med gsum// 'dod pas zhen pa smon pa yin// smon pa kun rdzogs rang rig nyid// lam dang 'bras bu dngos bzhi'i phyir// 'phrul dga'i 
281a5(mdo 'grel): longs spyod tshul bzhin du// gzhan du re smon skye ba med// chos nyid dbyings shes rjod pa'ang // spyod yul 'di dag med stong zhing // gsal bral stong pa'i chos dbyings dang // rang rig dag pa'i chos nyid dang // 
281a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings sogs pas// zhen yul chos can mtha' las rim// stong nyid mu mtha' med sogs smra// rang rig rtags mthong dbyings shes bya// gsang sngags chen po'i chos nyid dbyings/ 
281a7(mdo 'grel): chos can ma gol dmigs pa'ang med// byed med byas med bslad pa'ang med// 'di dang 'di zhes ris med pa// chos nyid dam pa de kho na'o// kun 'byung mu med brda' khyab med// gang yang ma spangs bkol ba med// 
281a8(mdo 'grel): phyogs chad med de blos rig med// de phyir gsang ba'i dbyings zhes bya// rnam grangs chos de na mkha' dang // mthu yod phyir na nyer sbyar ba'o// spros bral shes par bya ba'ang // log rtog zhen la spros pa rnams// skyon shes 
281b1(mdo 'grel): rab sel ba'i phyogs cig pa// phyogs cig spros pa'i mtha' thug bcings// rang rig ye shes spros pa'ang // spod len byed na spros pa'i mtha'// thig le kun nas bzlum pa ltar// spros pa ldan 'grub spos bral 
281b2(mdo 'grel): ni// ji snyed spros pa sems nyid phyir// rgyud 'dzin med pa'i byang chub sems// ming lnga ldan pa'i ye shes ni// de nyid tshes dbyings rang byung ste// mi gnas shes pa ldan 'grub pa// de kho de bzhin nyid dam pa'o// / 
281b3(mdo 'grel): yul dang ngo bos spros med phyir// spros bral kun gyi blang 'gyur yin// 'gro dang 'ong ba med pa'ang // zhen log 'gro 'ong dam par med// thun mong phyogs cig 'gro 'ong med// dag dang 'od gsal 'gro 'od med// 'gro 'ong 
281b4(mdo 'grel): phyogs la sprod byed cing // 'gro 'ong med phyogs rjes 'brangs pa// shes bya shes byed ya chab// dam pa'i lam du gang la 'gyur// 'gro 'od kun dang gnyis med pa'i// 'gro 'ong med pa chen po la// 'gro 'ong nyid na 
281b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i phyir// 'ang dang ma'ang med med med// rna mtshar 'brel ba'i 'bab chu bzhin// yad med mtha' yi pa med// zla ba 'phrul snang log snar dang // bla rab ltang 'brus rnam snang dang // s+yA dang ltar snang rim pa 
281b6(mdo 'grel): dag/ yod snang la sogs 'dus snang dang // bdag rig rang bzhin rkyen baspangs pas// lhar snang 'dod pas 'khrul mthang yin// snang med snang ba kun bdag nyid// rang rig ye shes cho 'phral ni// rgya mtsho chu dang 
281b7(mdo 'grel): brlabs bzhin du// byang chub sems nyid kun tu shar// 'gag pa med pa'i bye brag ni// med na mi 'byung 'gag med dang // blo bur tsam snang mi 'gog dang // 'bras bu rdo rje'i 'gag med gnyis// 'gag spong de dang 
281b8(mdo 'grel): 'bral 'dod na// 'gag med mtha' la zhen par zad// gnyis med 'gag pa med pa ni// rang byung ye shes rang snar phyir// 'gag pa nyid na 'gag med pas// na mkha' lta bur skye 'jig med// 'dod pa zhen pa
282a1(mdo 'grel): thob pa dang // spangs thob sbyangs thob 'grod pa dang // bdag yin las rung thob pa dag/ 'dod pas spangs thob phyir na rdzun// thob pa med pa'i thob pa ni// mtshan ldan long pa 
282a2(mdo 'grel): na/ na sa smra // na pa la med/ da byed pa'i dag nyes// len n+yai rtags pa man pa'i byed// da bye pa sngags 
282a3(mdo 'grel): can// bdag nyid chen po thob med ni// 'bras bu kun bdag rang rig la// gnyis phyir thob bya'i chos med te// dbul mo gter dang gyad nor bzhin// byed pos bgrol dang skrag grol dang // sbyangs pa grol ba phyogs cig pa//

282a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu rgyun phyogs cha khyer// mchog dang ring ba'i log lta can// chu bo bzhi nyid lam 'bras phyir// thabs dang shes rab las nyid kyi// chu bo nyid la rol spyod pas// brgal ba med par rnam par thar// chu la nya chen 'phyo ba 'am// 
282a7(mdo 'grel): sman sngags ldan pa'i dug nad 'dra'o// log pa'i kun rdzob rnam gnyis dang // 'khrul pa gzhan dbang kun rdzob rnams// rigs pa bzhis bcus bden lta ba'ang // yon tan brlabs 'byung lha yi 'khor// tshul mthun rigs 
282a8(mdo 'grel): pas 'bras bur lta// lhag pa kun rdzob don dam gnyis// bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya// thun mong don dam bye brag kyang // bshad pa cha yis shes par bya// rgya mtsho dang bar gza' skar bzhin// bden gnyis snang stong 
282b1(mdo 'grel): dbyer med pa// phyogs blta'i mthar thug med pa ni// de ka rang bzhin rgyud nyid do// zhen pa'i yul la ma chags pa'ang // tshim dang snying po bar chad sogs// chags med 'khrul dang log pa dang // bkag spangs phyogs

282b7(mdo 'grel): mar me gsal dus na// mun pa ma song sgrol med de// gsal nyid gnyis su med par lta// dngos zhen ma rig ye shes pa// spangs dang mi gnas 'gal ba med// yid bzhin nor bu'i yon tan ltar// dngos gnyis
282b8(mdo 'grel): lhan grub cing yang snang // chos kun gzhi zhes de phyir bya'o// rdzun la sogs pa'i rig pa ni// rgyu yi gzhi 'dod bden lta ba// phyogs cig yin gyi nges 'jog/ 'byung ba'i gzhi rtsar the tshom med// thams cad ye 
283a1(mdo 'grel): nas dbyer med la// rigs dang ma rigs blang dor med// gnyis med ston pa'i lung man ngag/ rigs pas 'tsham pa go 'byed pa// dpa' bo'i lag cha ji bzhin du// rnam grangs kun 
283a2(mdo 'grel): kyang rtogs pa'i thabs// rig pa med kyang thabs kyis mchog/ yin min chos la rtsod mi byed// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// dngos lha'i bdag med nyan thos pas// phyogs tsam stong pa'i chos bdag med// 
283a3(mdo 'grel): rgyun snang don 'gog bdag med dang // gsal ba phyogs cig bdag med dang // rigs snang bdag med ye shes snang // gsum gnyis spong len byed pa'i phyir// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yin// phyogs bcu rang/ 
283a4(mdo 'grel): byung ye shes la// rang byung 'di 'dri'i dngos med pas// chos dang gang zag yod ma yin// la lar nyi ma'ang mun rkyen ltar// bdag med ye shes bdag kun ldan// gnyis med bdag med bdag nyid che// med 
283a5(mdo 'grel): rbad thug pa 'das med// gzhan med spyod rgyam med pa yang // thabs gzhan pa'i yang pa med// zab pas rtags pa'i byad rdzu med// gzhan pa sad pas med pa dang // 'khrul pas med dang rdzun pas mes/ 
283a6(mdo 'grel): rig phyir med dang ye shes phyir// gzhan med pa'ang de bzhin no// de bral 'dod phyir lcags kyi dkris// sngon bzhin thams cad ye shes la// ngo bo cig phyir cha shas med// gcig mtha' med pas kun tu shar// 
283a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis su med pas phung gsum med// de la smra bsam med pa'i phyir// bzung 'dzin lcags kyis sdams pa med// lha rig gnyis kyi sngon brjod pa// 'dod pa tha dad yul mthong ba'o// shes rab spun gyi ngo bo ste// 
283a8(mdo 'grel): / ga ra/ na / na ge zhunam// gas 
283b1(mdo 'grel): las dang 'bras bu'i khyad par che'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes la// bcu drug gnyis su 'dod pa dang // bzhi dang gnyis su gnas 'gyur 'dod// rig pa bzhi dang lngar 'dod pa// rang rang rtags pa'i don mthong phyir//

283b3(mdo 'grel): phyir// sems nyid 'ba' zhig snang ba yang // 'khrul dus rang bzhin ma 'khrul dang // so so shes pa brgyad chos phyir// ming gsum ldan pa'i shes cig ste// gcig dang du ma kun dngos pas// ye shes kun gyi bdag 
283b4(mdo 'grel): nyid pa// cha yi lnga dang brgyad brjod pa// rtsa ba rang byung ye shes so// ye nas shes pa'i bdag nyid pas// me long lta ba'i tshul bzhin du// snang stong chos su grags pa kun// kha dog dbyibs sogs rang snang ba'o// 6

283b6(mdo 'grel): pa yang // ched du byas pa'i rtag snang zad// sum cu brgyad sogs mtha' rnams la// spong len bral 'dod zhen chags can// bdag med smra ba'i blang dor mkhan// blang dor mtha' la mkhan pa gnas// mchog 'dir
