288b7(mdo 'grel): lam gyi rgyal po// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dog thams 
288b8(mdo 'grel): cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad yid kyi mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab tud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 
289a1(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// rdul cig steng na rdal snyed sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa// thams cad rgyal ba 
289a2(mdo 'grel): dag gis gang bar mos// de dag bsngags pa mi zad kyi mtsharnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i smyagan gyis// rgyal bkun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gas pasdud/ 
289a3(mdo 'grel): me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang // mar me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog 
289a4(mdo 'grel): dang // bye ma'i phrar ma ri rab mnyam pa dang // bkod pas khyad pa'i 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams 
289a5(mdo 'grel): la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / 
289a6(mdo 'grel): sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang // 'gro ba kun gyi 
289a7(mdo 'grel): bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams 
289a8(mdo 'grel): cad la// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'da' ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang // bdag gis thal mo rab 
289b1(mdo 'grel): sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir sngo'o// 
289b2(mdo 'grel): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcul// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs ma da par byung // gang yang mabyedan de dag babyung bang // bas ma rtags byang chub ma par sangs rgyas sbyin// 
289b3(mdo 'grel): bcu gang 'ga'i ning rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras kyi rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang 
289b4(mdo 'grel): rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// mthun par gyur cig re ba'ang 'grub par shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun 
289b5(mdo 'grel): tu skye badran par gyur// tshor bas kun tu 'chi 'pho sde be na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su sla bsrur te// bzang ba spyad pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims spyod pa 
289b6(mdo 'grel): med yongs dag par// rtag tu mnyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par// thams cad 
289b7(mdo 'grel): skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te// byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag/ de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ 
289b8(mdo 'grel): las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol shing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang // ji ltar pad+ma chus ma chags pa bzhin// nyi bla na mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs 
290a1(mdo 'grel): rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun dgod cing // 'gro ba thams cad dag las phan par spad// byang chub spyod pa yongs// 
290a2(mdo 'grel): su rdzogs byed cing // sems can rnams kyi spyod dang mthun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing // ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par 'gyur// bdag gi spyod dang mthun par gang spyod pa// de 
290a3(mdo 'grel): dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa// 
290a4(mdo 'grel): rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon sum rtag tu bdag gi rgyal ba blta// ma 'ongs 
290a5(mdo 'grel): bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i tshes 'dzin cing // byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyang ba yang // ma 'ongs 
290a6(mdo 'grel): bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba na// bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur// 
290a7(mdo 'grel): rdal cig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de dag ma lus thams cad

290b1(mdo 'grel): kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsungs la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu

290b3(mdo 'grel): gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa me yi seng ge gang // de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod 
290b4(mdo 'grel): yul la// sgra ma gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ de dag dras gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa// de dag rtul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal 
290b5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor// mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drang du
290b6(mdo 'grel): bdag mchi'o// kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgra yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang // kun du yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// / 
290b7(mdo 'grel): kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang // chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed// 
290b8(mdo 'grel): las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing // bzang po spyad pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// 
291a1(mdo 'grel): zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing // sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par dgrol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing // ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par

294b3(mdo 'grel): gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i dbang nyid dang // bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud 
294b4(mdo 'grel): med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyi// bdag gi sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// 
294b5(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// gang yang rang 
294b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa 
294b7(mdo 'grel): dang // chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag gi rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la mgus gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags/ 
294b8(mdo 'grel): so// blun pa dang ni byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// bdag ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// stobs bcu 
295a1(mdo 'grel): rnams la mchod par shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig/ sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par 
295a2(mdo 'grel): shog/ sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang // thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las// de kun thar bgyid nus srid kyi// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyad par 
295a3(mdo 'grel): shog/ gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba// las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag ston gyur cig/ gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis// 
295a4(mdo 'grel): lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur// gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi// bshags pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ 
295a5(mdo 'grel): rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig/ srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang // yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs 
295a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs par sho ka/ ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang // dbang rnams byang chub yan lag gi/ stobs bcu dam par 
295a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar shog/ dgongs pa'i thugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/ thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni// nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol// bdag gi bskal pa brgya rnams su/ 
295a8(mdo 'grel): sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs par gzir// sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa/ 
295b1(mdo 'grel): bdag ni gang du'ang bdag ma mchis// sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rjer ldan// 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas// nongs par rab tu bzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod// bdag gis nyon 
295b2(mdo 'grel): mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas sol// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag la ni// snying rje'i chu yi bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis
295b3(mdo 'grel): dang // da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang // de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// nongs par bgyid pa'i las rnams kun// slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig 
295b4(mdo 'grel): de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so// lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las/ 
295b5(mdo 'grel): rnas par bsam pa dang // las rnams pazlapa brnas pad// de dag papas ga/ medag pas bcwa mangs nasas// dgebabacu pa bsnyen byas nas// sa brgya na pa dag nas 
295b6(mdo 'grel): bgyi// stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'jam 
295b7(mdo 'grel): bu gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams 'di gzhan dag tu// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yi rang ngo // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs 
295b8(mdo 'grel): pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chub mchog la reg par shog/ srid 'gro nyam ngar byas pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig// 
296a1(mdo 'grel): pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // 'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga dang // lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyi// bdag gis sdig pa 
296a2(mdo 'grel): gang bsags de 'chags so// byis pa thun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyamang dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal ba'i nyam pa 
296a3(mdo 'grel): ma sa/ shAn nga dun 
296a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan rgya mtsho 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba de dag rnams la sbubs su mchi// rtul ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal// gser mdog gser ni dri ma med par gser gyi 'od// dri med rnam dag bai DUr+ya me 
296a5(mdo 'grel): yan la gaphyan// sangs rgyas nyim dpal ga zi draga' bar 'byung ba'i gnas// gas rje'i 'a bdag gis mun pa zan na gags pa// yan la ga khri med dpa babang rnam pa mangs// sangs rgyas nyim yin lag 
296a6(mdo 'grel): dri med gser 'dras khyab// nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dral// thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyi dbang po yan lag mdzes// dpe byad 
296a7(mdo 'grel): bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUr+ya/

296b1(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i rlung chen phongs pa'i chu bor ltung ba las// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa// bder gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par 
296b2(mdo 'grel): snang // ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnam spras pa// sangs rgyas gser su 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang // ji 
296b3(mdo 'grel): ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab sde mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar na mkha'i tha ma mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can kun gyis shes par 
296b4(mdo 'grel): mi nus so// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan tha ma shes par mi nus so// chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni// bskal par bgrangs
296b5(mdo 'grel): na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog stan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sgra lus dang // dpe byad 'azang po brgyad cus brgyan pa 
296b6(mdo 'grel): yis// sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi rings sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig/ sems 
296b7(mdo 'grel): can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar byed shog/ stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig/ chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog/ bskal pa bsam mi khyab par bzhugs gyur cig/ bdud rtsi chu yi sems 
296b8(mdo 'grel): can tshim byed shog/ ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba rdzogs pa ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog/ nyon mongs 'joms shing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog/ 
297a1(mdo 'grel): tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba stong // bdag gi rtag tu tshe rabs dran par shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos shog/ bdag/ 
297a2(mdo 'grel): ni dge ba'i las ni 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog/ sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong gyur cig/ dge ba'i byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog/ zhing rnams kun na srog 
297a3(mdo 'grel): chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi 'gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams// de kun de ring dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // 
297a4(mdo 'grel): phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u sdig gsang thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa 
297a5(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa// sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun// 'jig tshogs mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs shing bcings pas bcings gzir ba/

297a8(mdo 'grel): par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cing // 'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams zos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyi sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dbul pos gtad rnams rnyed par 
297b1(mdo 'grel): shog/ nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis// sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog/ gang yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ma gyur// sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang // gzugs/ 
297b2(mdo 'grel): bzang mdzes shing shin tu shis par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag/ bsam ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang //

297b4(mdo 'grel): na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur// de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed 'gyur bar shog/ mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang 
297b5(mdo 'grel): yod// de dag bsam par de dag skye bar 'gyur// bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog/ spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang //

298a7(mdo 'grel): nams des// bdag gi smon lam 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang // dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang // yongs su 
298a8(mdo 'grel): bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cu ngan song spong bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang 
298b1(mdo 'grel): bstod pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po kun gyi yan lag rgyas// bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal po rtag tu de mchod de// ded 
298b2(mdo 'grel): de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rna ba'i bu gang bshags pa 'dis ni grag gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gis gan nas dge ba byas ma yin// gnyis las ma yin bzhi las ma gyur cig/

299a7(mdo 'grel): ngag 'jig rten gsum mchod mkhas pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sangs rgyas skyabs song la// lngas rtsen lag na rdo rje nor sbyin dpal can nor bu bzang sras la sogs pa/ de dag thams cad lhan cig rtag tu khyod kyi khyim

299b1(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin dbang po lag na rdo rje rang gi sde tshan bcas dang rang gi sder bcas dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin dbang po gang dag sde chen grags ldan bstan pa dag la dga' ba rnams// thams cad mthun par khyod kyi

299b7(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de phyir sku gzugs mchod rten gyi// spyan snga'am yang na gzhan du'ang rung // tshegs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di// nyin gcig bzhin yang dus gsum brjod// sangs rgyas/ 
299b8(mdo 'grel): dam chos dge 'dun dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // rnam kun btud de skyabs mchis nas// mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sdig pa las ni ldog bgyid cing // bsod nams thams 
300a1(mdo 'grel): cad yongs su bzung // lus can kun gyi bsod nams dag/ kun la rjes su yi rang ngo // bdag ni spyi btud thal sbyar te// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad dang // 'gro gnas 
300a2(mdo 'grel): bar du bzhugs slad du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol// de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang // bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang // des ni sems can thams cad kyang // bla med byang 
300a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems ldan shog/ sems can thams cad dri med dbang // yongs rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing // spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang // 'tsho ba bzang dang ldan par shog/ lus can dag ni thams

300a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad rig pa dang // rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog// lus can kha dag ldan pa dang // gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang /

300a7(mdo 'grel): chos nor che ldan shog/ byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // nyon mongs btang snyoms gnas pa dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kyis rgyan cing // mchog rnams thams 
300a8(mdo 'grel): cad yongs rdzogs te// mtshan dang dpe byad gsal ba dang // bsam gyis mi byabs bcu dag/ rgyun mi 'chad par bgrod par shog/ bdag kyang yon tan de dag dang // gzhan kun gyis kyang brgyan ldan te/ 
300b1(mdo 'grel): nyes pa kun las grol ba dang // sems can kun mchog byams pa dang // sems can kun yid re ba yi// dge ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing // rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal sal
300b2(mdo 'grel): bar bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo gang // su dag 'jigs pa'i skyo ba de// bdag gi ming tsam thos pas kyang // shin tu 'jigs pa med par shog/ bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang // ming tsam 
300b3(mdo 'grel): zos pas skye bo kun// rab dang 'khrug med rnam ma dang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges pa dang // tshe rabs kun tu rjes 'brang ba'i// mngon shes lnga po thob par shog/ sems can kun la rnam kun tu// rtag 
300b4(mdo 'grel): tu phan bde bgyid par shog/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo gang // sdig pa byed pa 'dod gyur pa// de dag thams cad gnod med par// rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // sman dang dgon 
300b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i shing bzhin du// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// rang dgang dgag med spyod par shog/ sems can rnams la srog sbyin phangs// bdag pa de dag ches phangs shog/ bdag la de dag sdig ldan cing // 
300b6(mdo 'grel): bdag dge ma lus der sngan shog/ ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang // gang du ma grol de srid du// de pyir blan med pa yi// byang chub zab kyang gnas gyung cig/ de sad brjod pa'i bsod nams gang // 
300b7(mdo 'grel): tede ni gzugs can gyur// gda'i bye ma snyed kyi ni// 'jig rten khams su shong mi 'gyur// slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa// rgyal po la gtam bya ba rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba las 'byung ba'i smon lam// 
300b8(mdo 'grel): tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so// kyang chum mas dang tsud pa lam jugs/ 
301a1(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar 'di dag kun byas te// dge ba bdag gis bsags pa gang // des ni sems can thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal thams cad 
301a2(mdo 'grel): bsal bar shog/ 'gro ba nad pa ji srid du// nad sos gyur gyi bar du ni// sman dang sman pa nyid dag dang // de yi nad g.yog byed par shog/ zas dang skom gyi char phab ste// bkres dang skom gyi gnod pa bsal// mu 
301a3(mdo 'grel): ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i tshe// bdag dang zas dang skom du gyur// sems can phongs shing dbul ba la// bdag ni mi zad gter gyur te// yo byad mkho dgu sna tshogs su// mdun na nye bar gnas gyur cig/ bdag la 
301a4(mdo 'grel): dmigs nas nam du yang // 'ga' yang don med ma gyur cig/ bdag la dmigs nas gang dag gi/ khro ba 'am dad pa'i sems byung na// de nyid rtag tu de dag gi/ don kun 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ gang dag bdag la 
301a5(mdo 'grel): kha zer ram// gzhan gang gnod pa byed pa 'am// de bzhin phyar ka gtong yang rung // thams cad byang chub skal ldan gyur// bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon// lam zhugs rnams kyi ded dpon dang // rgal 
301a6(mdo 'grel): da rnams kyi tha da // ga sa dngapas pa nyid kya// na seM dang ni// gnas pa 'a sa gnas papa dang// bdaganamapa can na 'dad // kun ce cad du 'byung ba shig/ yad nan 
301a7(mdo 'grel): bu bum pa bzang // rig sngags grub dang sman chen dang // dpag bsam gyis ni shing dag dang // lus can rnams kyi 'dod 'jor gyur// sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang // na mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang // 
301a8(mdo 'grel): sems can dpag tu med pa yi// rnam mang nyed 'tsho'i gzhir yang shog/ de bzhin na mkhas mthas gtugs pa'i// sems can khams la rnam kun tu// thams cad mya ngan 'das par du// bdag ni nye 'tsho'i 
301b1(mdo 'grel): gzhir yang shog/ bdag gis byang chub spyod pa la// 'jug pa rnam par bsams pa yi// dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun// byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog/ phyogs rnams kun la lus dang sems// sdug 
301b2(mdo 'grel): bsngal nad pa ji snyed pa// de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyis// bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par shog/ de dag sangs rgyas bde thob kyi// bar du bde ba nyams ma gyur// 'gro bas bla na med pa yi// bde ba rgyan mi 'chad
301b3(mdo 'grel): thob shog/ 'jig rten khams na dmyal ba dag/ gang dag ji snyed yod pa rnams// de dag du ni lus can rnams// bde can bde bas dga' bar shog/ grang bas nyam thag dro thob shog/ byang chub sems 
301b4(mdo 'grel): dpa'i sprin chen las// byung ba'i chu bo mtha' yas kyis// tshabs nyam thag bsil bar shog/ ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal yang // de la dga' tshal sdug gur shog/ shal ma li yi sdong po yang // dpag 
301b5(mdo 'grel): bsam shing du 'khrungs par shog/ tha~Mr ril dur pa dag dang ngang pa dang // bzhad sogs skad snyan 'byin pas mdzes gyur cing // pad+ma dri bsung tshe ldan mtsho dag gis// dmyal ba'i sa phyogs dag ni nyams dgar 
301b6(mdo 'grel): shog/ sol phud de yang rin chen phung por gyur// sa bsregs shel gyi sa gzhi bltar bar shog/ sdus 'joms ri bo rnams kyang mchod pa yi// gzhal med khang gyur pade gshegs gang bar shog/ 
301b7(mdo 'grel): ma dag ma rdo bsregs mtshon gyi char pa dag/ deng nas bzung ste me tog char par gyur// phan tshun mtshon gyis 'debs pa de yang ni// deng nas rtse phyir me tog 'phen par shog/ chu bo rab med me dang 'dra 
301b8(mdo 'grel): nad bying ba dag/ sha kun zhig gyur dus gong me tog kun da'i mdog/ bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis lha yi lus thob nas// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dal gyis 'babs gnas shog/ ci'i phyir 'dir ni

302a5(mdo 'grel): kyis lha brgya'i cod pan dag gis zhabs kyis pad+ma la mchod cing // thugs rjes brlan spyan dbu la me tog du ma'i tshogs kyis char 'bab pa// khang brtsegs yid 'ong lha mo stong phrag bstod dbyangs sgrogs ldan 'di ltos

306a5(mdo 'grel): mtho ris mi yi lus su skye bar shog/ mtho ris mi yi lus su skyes nas kyang // sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang // dmag dpon zhal che spyod par bdag ma skye// khe byed til rdung chang tshong rkun po 
306a6(mdo 'grel): dang // bran dang bran mo'i lus su bdag ma skye// dge slong gnas la dbang byed bdag po dang // gnas brtan las byed pa dang nang khrims pa// dge skos gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhag pa// gang zag 
306a7(mdo 'grel): las byed rnams su bdag ma skye// mtha' 'khob kla klo skye ba'i yul rnams dang // glen lkug sa 'o na long phrag dog can rnams dang // mu stegs log rtog bran ze'i rigs rnams dang // rigs ngan bshan 
306a8(mdo 'grel): pa'i rigs su bdag ma skye// byang chub mthob bar du brtag par bdag/ dam chos spyod pa'i lus su skye bar shog/ dam chos spyod pa'i lus su skyes nas kyang // mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing 
306b1(mdo 'grel): tshetshal nad kyis bar gcod med pa dang // skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog/ skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad nas kyang // mnyan pa sams bsgoms pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs te// ting 'dzin rtse gcig 
306b2(mdo 'grel): sems la dbang thob ce// dam shes drug pa yul la g.yengs ma byung / A sa b+h+rUM yan lagaces shing ston med de// dbang po mnyams rigs mtho bkur ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas chos kun 
306b3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs par byed pa dang // gzhon nu rab byung tshul khrims ldan pa dang // dge bshes mchog rnams rtag tu bsten byed cing // sa bcu rim gyis bgrod rnams thogs med de// bla med byang chub myur 
306b4(mdo 'grel): du thob par shog/ bla med byang chub myur du thob nas kyang // rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la// bsdu ba rnam bzhis 'gro don byed par shog/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis 
306b5(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rigs kyi smon las zhes bya ba zhugs so//

306b7(mdo 'grel): dbang po gsal bar 'chi ba dang // gnad gcod sdug bsngal med pa dang // srid pa bar ma do ru yang // rang byung ye shes rtogs par shog/ rang byung ye shes rtogs nas kyang // gar skye rang dbang

307a1(mdo 'grel): shog/ chos ldan grogs dang phrad nas kyang // gtso bo dkon mchog mchod pa dang // sdom pa gsum la gnas par shog/ sdom pa gsum la gnas nas kyang //

307b1(mdo 'grel): par 'jug par shog/ bdag gis bsod nams 'di yis ni// nam mkha' kun khyab skye bo rnams// ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhing // mi kho ma thams cad rnam par spangs// skye bar lha dang mi yi ni//

307b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas thob par shog/ ji ltar 'khor ba'i gnas skabs su// bsams pa'i don kun thams cad ni// na mkha'i mdzod 'dzin mkha' nyid nas// sems can kun la 'byung bar shog/

307b7(mdo 'grel): sems can don kun byed pa dang // chos kun don ni ston par shog/ 'jig rten khams ni sems can kun// gang la gnod pa byed kyang ni// bdag ni de dag thams cad la// phan 'dogs byed pa nyid/

312b1(mdo 'grel): por gyur cing sred gsum gyi// chu bo dag la zam pa brtan po dang // ngan song gnas kyi sgo gtan bgyid par shog/ bdag gi ming tsam dran na'ang 'jus pa bzhin// 'gro ba ma lus srid pa'i/

319a4(mdo 'grel): sems can ma lus pa'i don du bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang dus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du/ dkon mchog gsum

319a6(mdo 'grel): srungs ma thugs dam can mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa 'khor mtha' yas pa dang bcas 
319a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba chos thos pa/ bstan pa bsur bar khas blangs pa/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen po de dag la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rgya chen po gtams shing 
319a8(mdo 'grel): phul ba dang / 'gro ba ris drug khams gsum gyis bsdus pa/ lam rgyud lngar 'khor zhing / 'gro ba ris drug tu skye gnas rnam pa bzhi las skyes pa/ ji tsam sems 
319b1(mdo 'grel): can gyi ris na mchis pa/ sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa thams cad la yang bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis bsdus pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma rgya chen po khyab par bsngos
319b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang / tshe rabs rgyud pa nas lan chags par gyur pa'i bgegs rnams la yang / gnas dang / dus dang / longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma
319b3(mdo 'grel): chen po bsngos shing stsal ba/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / gzhan yang bdag cag gi snga slad dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis so// 'tshal gyi mthu dang / khyad par du yang yum 
319b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs te/ shes rab rnam gsum gyi don du gsungs pa'i phyogs/ g.yo rgyu med par bris pa dang / bklags shing bton pa 
319b5(mdo 'grel): dang / mchod cing rim gro bgyid pa dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi mthu dang / lha dang drang srong la sogs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang / bden 
319b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cag gis mchod pa bshams pa'i gnas 'di/ sngon bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ 
319b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher bstan cing bshad pa de bzhin du/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par gyur cig/ yum shes 
319b8(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bcas pa/ pho brang gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'dir spyan drangs te/ 
320a1(mdo 'grel): mchod pa dang / bklags pa dang / mdo sde dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhung dang / dngos grub kyi cho ga dang / 
320a2(mdo 'grel): mchod pa la sogs pa'i dbang dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad tshe rabs gar skyes gar
320a3(mdo 'grel): gnas kyang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad ni byang / ngan song gsum dang / mi khom brgyad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad las ni yang dag par 
320a4(mdo 'grel): grol zhing thar te/ bde 'gro lnga'i 'jig rten du skyes nas/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong ste/ phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ 
320a5(mdo 'grel): bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten khams 'di zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas 'di lta bu zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung
320a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa myur du thob nas bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su myur du grub par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas ma grub kyi bar du 'jig rten 'di dag tu yang / tshe ring / nad med/ longs spyod 
320a7(mdo 'grel): 'phel/ rigs rgyud rgyas shing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra bgegs bar du gcod pa cis kyang mi tshugs 
320a8(mdo 'grel): shing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos spyod rnam
320b1(mdo 'grel): pa bcu'i sgo nas tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi khyab na yang / mdor bsdus pa bcu ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sras su dgongs shing byin gyis 
320b2(mdo 'grel): brlab par 'gyur ba dang / tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa bsrungs ma thugs dam can rnams kyis bu bzhin du skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang dbang phyug pun sum 
320b3(mdo 'grel): tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa gnod pa thams cad kyis bsam sbyar ngan pas mi tshugs pa dang / gza' sar dang rmi ltas la sogs 
320b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlogs par 'gyur ba dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan 
320b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad bos pa bzhin du 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang mi grol bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal 
320b6(mdo 'grel): mngon du mthong ba dang / mthar bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba rnams bdag cag 
320b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa la smin cing grub par gyur cig/ khyad par du yang bod kyi rgyal khams su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring por bzhugs par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 
320b8(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhugs pa'i yul phyogs su yang / ngan sems kyi 'khrug pa mi 'byung ba dang / mi nad dang phyugs nad rgyun chad pa dang / lo phyugs rtag tu legs 
321a1(mdo 'grel): char chu dus su phebs/ bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te/ sems can thams cad dge ba spyod pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan par gyur cig/ 
321a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang ba'i gang zag log sred can bstan pa bzhig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ chu shing gi rtsa ba bzhin du gyur cig/ dkon mchog gsum la dad cing/ 
321a3(mdo 'grel): dam pa'i chos srung ba'i bsam pa bzang po dang / ldan pa'i gang zag rnams ni tshe ring zhing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 
321a4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun tu/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin brlabs dang / dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyi mthu byin gyis// gang dang gang na ji ltar gnas pa yi// sgrib dang sdug bsngal 
321a5(mdo 'grel): ma lus kun bsal cing // 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus rab bsnyil nas// rgyud drug 'gro ba ma lus kun bsgral te// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas bsgrubs pa'i zhing // rin chen 
321a6(mdo 'grel): mdzes pa rnam bkod bde ba can// bdud rtsi mtsho dang dpag bsam shing dang ldan// der 'byung skal ldan pad+ma'i mchog las skyes// yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pa 'phags pa'i 
321a7(mdo 'grel): sa// rnam dag khyad par can gyi gnas mchog der// thog med brdzus te bde bar gshegs gyur nas// mtshan tsam thos pas sgrib pa rnam sel ba// rin chen 'od 'bar smra/ 
321a8(mdo 'grel): mchog 'gro ba'i skyabs// tshe dang longs spyod dpag med sbyin pa'i gtso// snang ba mtha' yas 'gro don mngon sum ste// de las mchog thob lung bstan dbang bskur nas// 
321b1(mdo 'grel): rgyal sras gnyis dang spyod pa'i blo mthun zhing // phyogs bcur 'gro la phan pa'i don mdzad nas// srid gsum yongs kyi skyabs su gyur par shog/ 'phags pa shes rab 
321b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyogs kyi smon lam rdzogs so//

321b4(mdo 'grel): yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar bar// yid dang rin chen mang pos sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas// mkhyen bzhi shes bcu ga chen mtsho dang ldan pa yi// chos rje sangs rgyas byang chub 
321b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad dang // chos mdzad rang rgyal nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad la// lus btud dad pa'i spyi bos phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi// chos kyi rgyal ba 
321b6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// thugs rje snyoms pa'i mar dang ting 'dzin snying po las// rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gsal ba'i mar me 'bar// 'od bzang bdud 
321b7(mdo 'grel): rtsis srid gsum 'jig rten thams cad khyab// sdug bsngal nad sel mi shes mun pa kun sel ba// dam chos mdo yi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs kyis bskrad 
321b8(mdo 'grel): pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// dam chos lung bstan sdel gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// tshigs su bcad pa'i sdel gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// ched du brjod 
322a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i snga lags pas caka'atshal pa / dam nas ga sngal gas pas rgyaka' tshal ma // 'di ltar 'dus pa'i sem gus pas/ 
322a2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal mchod// skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// rmad du byung ba'i sde la gus pas phyag 
322a3(mdo 'grel): 'tshal mchod// rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// gtan la 'bebs pa'i sde la gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod// skyes bu gang gis chos la gus 
322a4(mdo 'grel): byas gang zhigags// klu da rgyams na du byu ba dang // skad pa'i dka' thub dang kyigs ts+tsha hA yad+ma/ m+bu da pas 
322a5(mdo 'grel): blo gsal dag bzang skye bo ji snyed bzhugs gang la// dad pa'i sems kyi rjes su yi rang phyag 'tshal nas// chos brjed seng ge'i sgra sgrogs chos kyi sbyin pa 'di// 'phags pa chos

322a7(mdo 'grel): yid mthun chos kyi char 'babashog/ 'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi dbyings gzhi bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces

325b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// / @bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal gyis mdzad pa'i sngob bzhugs so//

325b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal tshogs bsal dge 'dun tshogs rnams la// lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o// lus kyi gus bcas bsti stang rab sbubs te// dang sems 'dun 
325b5(mdo 'grel): bcas rtogs ldan gsal 'gyur la// yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rab brjod de// mgon po sras bcas bdag gis rab tu bstod// me tog phreng ba sil snyan mchog 
325b6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang // byug pa gdugs dang mar me bdug spos rnams// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis dbul bar gyi// rin chen na bza' rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gdugs dang bla re 
325b7(mdo 'grel): pho brang gdan la sogs// khyad par can gyi rgya mtsho thams cad kun// za bas mkhas kun rdzob byang chub sems yin te// 'gro ba'i don du dang bas bdag 'bul gyis// 
325b8(mdo 'grel): thugs brtser dgongs nas 'di dag bzhes su gsol// gnyis med mtha' bral don dam byang chub sems// bsngo dang bsngo bya nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra yang // sngon spyod rgyal 
326a1(mdo 'grel): sras bsngo mdzad ji bzhin du// shes rab rtsal gyis bdag gis bsngo bar bgyi// phyogs dus kun gyi rgyal ba sras bcas dang // dam
326a2(mdo 'grel): chos bsrung bar nyid kyis zhal 'ches pa'i// tshangs ris tshangs bcas 'og min lha la sags// gzhan 'phrul 'phrul dga' dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // brgya byin 
326a3(mdo 'grel): dbang rgyal chen phyogs skyong bcas// sa 'og sa steng nam mkha' bar snang bcas// bsod nams tshogs ldan lha tshogs mang po kun// thugs brtser dgongs nas dbang 
326a4(mdo 'grel): po mdzad du gsol// khyed kyi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa ni// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can thams cad kyi// thog ma med nas skye ba 'di bar du// bdag 'dzin 
326a5(mdo 'grel): sgyu mkhan log pa'i sems brgyud nas// nyon mongs drug dang nye ba nyi shu yi// dbang du gyur nas sdig pa'i las byas pa'i// mtshams med lnga dang de dang nye ba lnga// mi dge 
326a6(mdo 'grel): bcu dang mi khom brgyad la sogs// bya bar ma 'os bdag gis bgyis pa dang // sdig pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi rkyen song nas// bdud rtsi spangs nas dug 'thungs ji bzhin

326a8(mdo 'grel): tsan thams cad kyis// rang gis bgyid dang bgyid du rtsal ba dang // bgyid par byed la rjes su yi rang bas// sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i// 'bras bu'i 
326b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal nyams su myong 'gyur kun// dang sems brtson pas rab tu bshags 'gyur bas// myong bar ma gyur smin par ma gyur cig/ deng nas bzung nas ma 'ongs 
326b2(mdo 'grel): dus su yang // rkyen du mi 'tsham sdig pa'i las rnams kun// nam yang mi bgyid dam du bcas pas na// 'phags pa'i 'khor tshogs thugs rje che rnams kyi// tshangs 
326b3(mdo 'grel): pa rtsal nas byin gyis rlob tu gsol// byang chub snying po myur du bgrod pa dang // 'gro ba ma lus byang chub bsgral ba'i phyir// dang ba'i sems kyis dge ba bsngo ba ni// thog ma

327a1(mdo 'grel): dang // phyi nang rten 'brel rgyu 'bras phye ba dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs dang // ma 'dres chos dang rnam pa

327b5(mdo 'grel): chen spar nas su// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes chen po yis// 'og ma'i skyon rnams myur du bsal nas kyang // kun gyis mthun par byang chub thob par shog/ ma nor tshul bzhin dge
